62 spoton_neighbor::spoton_neighbor
63 (
64 #if QT_VERSION < 0x050000
65  const int socketDescriptor,
66 #else
67  const qintptr socketDescriptor,
68 #endif
69  const QByteArray &certificate,
70  const QByteArray &privateKey,
71  const QString &echoMode,
72  const bool useAccounts,
73  const qint64 listenerOid,
74  const qint64 maximumBufferSize,
75  const qint64 maximumContentLength,
76  const QString &transport,
77  const QString &ipAddress,
78  const QString &port,
79  const QString &localIpAddress,
80  const QString &localPort,
81  const QString &orientation,
82  const QString &motd,
83  const QString &sslControlString,
84  const Priority priority,
85  const int laneWidth,
86  const int passthrough,
87  const int sourceOfRandomness,
88  const QByteArray &privateApplicationCredentials,
89 #if QT_VERSION >= 0x050200 && defined(SPOTON_BLUETOOTH_ENABLED)
90  QBluetoothSocket *socket,
91 #endif
92  QObject *parent):QThread(parent)
93 {
94  m_abort = 0;
95  m_kernelInterfaces = spoton_kernel::interfaces();
96  m_laneWidth = qBound(spoton_common::LANE_WIDTH_MINIMUM,
97  laneWidth,
98  spoton_common::LANE_WIDTH_MAXIMUM);
99  m_bluetoothSocket = 0;
100  m_passthrough = passthrough;
101  m_privateApplicationCredentials = privateApplicationCredentials;
102  m_privateApplicationSequences.first = m_privateApplicationSequences.second =
103  1;
104  m_sctpSocket = 0;
105  m_sourceOfRandomness = qBound
106  (0,
107  sourceOfRandomness,
108  static_cast<int> (std::numeric_limits<unsigned short>::max()));
109  m_tcpSocket = 0;
110  m_udpSocket = 0;
111  m_maximumBufferSize =
112  qBound(spoton_common::MAXIMUM_NEIGHBOR_CONTENT_LENGTH,
113  maximumBufferSize,
114  spoton_common::MAXIMUM_NEIGHBOR_BUFFER_SIZE);
115 
116  if(transport == "bluetooth")
117  {
118 #if QT_VERSION >= 0x050200 && defined(SPOTON_BLUETOOTH_ENABLED)
119  m_bluetoothSocket = socket;
120 
121  if(m_bluetoothSocket)
122  {
123  connect(m_bluetoothSocket,
124  SIGNAL(disconnected(void)),
125  this,
126  SIGNAL(disconnected(void)));
127  connect(m_bluetoothSocket,
128  SIGNAL(disconnected(void)),
129  this,
130  SLOT(slotDisconnected(void)));
131  connect(m_bluetoothSocket,
132  SIGNAL(error(QBluetoothSocket::SocketError)),
133  this,
134  SLOT(slotError(QBluetoothSocket::SocketError)));
135  connect(m_bluetoothSocket,
136  SIGNAL(readyRead(void)),
137  this,
138  SLOT(slotReadyRead(void)));
139  socket->setParent(this);
140  }
141 #endif
142  }
143  else if(transport == "sctp")
144  m_sctpSocket = new spoton_sctp_socket(this);
145  else if(transport == "tcp")
146  m_tcpSocket = new spoton_neighbor_tcp_socket(this);
147  else if(transport == "udp")
148  m_udpSocket = new spoton_neighbor_udp_socket(this);
149 
150  if(m_bluetoothSocket)
151  {
152  }
153  else if(m_sctpSocket)
154  {
155  m_sctpSocket->setReadBufferSize(m_maximumBufferSize);
156  m_sctpSocket->setSocketDescriptor(static_cast<int> (socketDescriptor));
157  m_sctpSocket->setSocketOption
158  (spoton_sctp_socket::KeepAliveOption, 1);
159  m_sctpSocket->setSocketOption
160  (spoton_sctp_socket::LowDelayOption,
161  spoton_kernel::setting("kernel/sctp_nodelay", 1).
162  toInt()); /*
163  ** Disable Nagle?
164  */
165  }
166  else if(m_tcpSocket)
167  {
168  m_tcpSocket->setReadBufferSize(m_maximumBufferSize);
169  m_tcpSocket->setSocketDescriptor(socketDescriptor);
170  m_tcpSocket->setSocketOption
171  (QAbstractSocket::KeepAliveOption, 1);
172  m_tcpSocket->setSocketOption
173  (QAbstractSocket::LowDelayOption,
174  spoton_kernel::setting("kernel/tcp_nodelay", 1).
175  toInt()); /*
176  ** Disable Nagle?
177  */
178  }
179  else if(m_udpSocket)
180  {
181 #ifdef Q_OS_WIN32
182  m_udpSocket->setSocketDescriptor
183  (_dup(static_cast<int> (socketDescriptor)));
184 #else
185  m_udpSocket->setSocketDescriptor
186  (dup(static_cast<int> (socketDescriptor)));
187 #endif
188  m_udpSocket->setLocalAddress(QHostAddress(localIpAddress));
189  m_udpSocket->setLocalPort(localPort.toUShort());
190  m_udpSocket->setPeerAddress(QHostAddress(ipAddress));
191  m_udpSocket->setPeerPort(port.toUShort());
192  }
193 
194  if(m_bluetoothSocket)
195  {
196 #if QT_VERSION >= 0x050200 && defined(SPOTON_BLUETOOTH_ENABLED)
197  m_address = m_bluetoothSocket->peerAddress().toString();
198 #endif
199  }
200  else if(m_sctpSocket)
201  m_address = m_sctpSocket->peerAddress().toString();
202  else if(m_tcpSocket)
203  m_address = m_tcpSocket->peerAddress().toString();
204  else if(m_udpSocket)
205  m_address = ipAddress.trimmed();
206 
207  m_accountAuthenticated = 0;
208  m_allowExceptions = false;
209  m_bytesRead = 0;
210  m_bytesWritten = 0;
211  m_echoMode = echoMode;
212  m_externalAddress = new spoton_external_address(this);
213  m_id = -1; /*
214  ** This neighbor was created by a listener. We must
215  ** obtain a valid id at some point (setId())!
216  */
217  m_ipAddress = m_address.trimmed();
218  m_isUserDefined = false;
219  m_lastReadTime = QDateTime::currentDateTime();
220  m_listenerOid = listenerOid;
221  m_maximumContentLength =
222  qBound(spoton_common::MINIMUM_NEIGHBOR_CONTENT_LENGTH,
223  maximumContentLength,
224  spoton_common::MAXIMUM_NEIGHBOR_CONTENT_LENGTH);
225  m_motd = motd;
226  m_orientation = orientation;
227 
228  if(m_bluetoothSocket)
229  {
230 #if QT_VERSION >= 0x050200 && defined(SPOTON_BLUETOOTH_ENABLED)
231  m_port = m_bluetoothSocket->peerPort();
232 #endif
233  }
234  else if(m_sctpSocket)
235  m_port = m_sctpSocket->peerPort();
236  else if(m_tcpSocket)
237  m_port = m_tcpSocket->peerPort();
238  else if(m_udpSocket)
239  m_port = port.toUShort();
240 
241  m_receivedUuid = "{00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000}";
242  m_silenceTime = spoton_common::NEIGHBOR_SILENCE_TIME;
243  m_sslControlString = sslControlString.trimmed();
244 
245  if(m_sslControlString.isEmpty())
246  m_sslControlString = spoton_common::SSL_CONTROL_STRING;
247 
248  m_statusControl = "connected";
249  m_startTime = QDateTime::currentDateTime();
250  m_transport = transport;
251  m_useAccounts = useAccounts ? 1 : 0;
252 
253  if(m_transport == "tcp")
254  m_requireSsl = true;
255  else
256  m_requireSsl = false;
257 
258  if(certificate.isEmpty() || m_transport != "tcp" || privateKey.isEmpty())
259  m_useSsl = false;
260  else
261  m_useSsl = true;
262 
263  m_waitforbyteswritten_msecs = 0;
264 
265  if(m_useSsl)
266  {
267  if(m_tcpSocket)
268  {
269  QSslConfiguration configuration;
270 
271  configuration.setLocalCertificate(QSslCertificate(certificate));
272 
273  if(
274 #if QT_VERSION < 0x050000
275  configuration.localCertificate().isValid()
276 #else
277  !configuration.localCertificate().isNull()
278 #endif
279  )
280  {
281  configuration.setPrivateKey(QSslKey(privateKey, QSsl::Rsa));
282 
283  if(!configuration.privateKey().isNull())
284  {
285 #if QT_VERSION >= 0x040800
286  configuration.setSslOption
287  (QSsl::SslOptionDisableCompression, true);
288  configuration.setSslOption
289  (QSsl::SslOptionDisableEmptyFragments, true);
290  configuration.setSslOption
291  (QSsl::SslOptionDisableLegacyRenegotiation, true);
292  configuration.setSslOption
293  (QSsl::SslOptionDisableSessionTickets, true);
294 #if QT_VERSION >= 0x050200
295  configuration.setSslOption
296  (QSsl::SslOptionDisableSessionPersistence, true);
297  configuration.setSslOption
298  (QSsl::SslOptionDisableSessionSharing, true);
299 #endif
300 #endif
301 #if QT_VERSION >= 0x050000
302  spoton_crypt::setSslCiphers
303  (configuration.supportedCiphers(), m_sslControlString,
304  configuration);
305 #else
306  spoton_crypt::setSslCiphers
307  (m_tcpSocket->supportedCiphers(), m_sslControlString,
308  configuration);
309 #endif
310  m_tcpSocket->setSslConfiguration(configuration);
311  }
312  else
313  {
314  m_useSsl = false;
315  spoton_misc::logError
316  (QString("spoton_neighbor::spoton_neighbor(): "
317  "empty private key for %1:%2. SSL disabled.").
318  arg(m_address).
319  arg(m_port));
320  }
321  }
322  else
323  {
324  m_useSsl = false;
325  spoton_misc::logError
326  (QString("spoton_neighbor::spoton_neighbor(): "
327  "invalid local certificate for %1:%2. "
328  "SSL disabled.").
329  arg(m_address).
330  arg(m_port));
331  }
332  }
333  }
334 
335  if(!m_useSsl)
336  m_sslControlString = "N/A";
337 
338  connect(this,
339  SIGNAL(accountAuthenticated(const QByteArray &,
340  const QByteArray &,
341  const QByteArray &)),
342  this,
343  SLOT(slotAccountAuthenticated(const QByteArray &,
344  const QByteArray &,
345  const QByteArray &)));
346  connect(this,
347  SIGNAL(resetKeepAlive(void)),
348  this,
349  SLOT(slotResetKeepAlive(void)));
350  connect(this,
351  SIGNAL(sharePublicKey(const QByteArray &,
352  const QByteArray &,
353  const QByteArray &,
354  const QByteArray &,
355  const QByteArray &,
356  const QByteArray &)),
357  this,
358  SLOT(slotSharePublicKey(const QByteArray &,
359  const QByteArray &,
360  const QByteArray &,
361  const QByteArray &,
362  const QByteArray &,
363  const QByteArray &)));
364  connect(this,
365  SIGNAL(stopTimer(QTimer *)),
366  this,
367  SLOT(slotStopTimer(QTimer *)));
368  connect(this,
369  SIGNAL(writeParsedApplicationData(const QByteArray &)),
370  this,
371  SLOT(slotWriteParsedApplicationData(const QByteArray &)));
372 
373  if(m_bluetoothSocket)
374  {
375  }
376  else if(m_sctpSocket)
377  {
378  connect(m_sctpSocket,
379  SIGNAL(disconnected(void)),
380  this,
381  SIGNAL(disconnected(void)));
382  connect(m_sctpSocket,
383  SIGNAL(disconnected(void)),
384  this,
385  SLOT(slotDisconnected(void)));
386  connect(m_sctpSocket,
387  SIGNAL(error(const QString &,
388  const spoton_sctp_socket::SocketError)),
389  this,
390  SLOT(slotError(const QString &,
391  const spoton_sctp_socket::SocketError)));
392  connect(m_sctpSocket,
393  SIGNAL(readyRead(void)),
394  this,
395  SLOT(slotReadyRead(void)));
396  }
397  else if(m_tcpSocket)
398  {
399  connect(m_tcpSocket,
400  SIGNAL(disconnected(void)),
401  this,
402  SIGNAL(disconnected(void)));
403  connect(m_tcpSocket,
404  SIGNAL(disconnected(void)),
405  this,
406  SLOT(slotDisconnected(void)));
407  connect(m_tcpSocket,
408  SIGNAL(encrypted(void)),
409  this,
410  SLOT(slotEncrypted(void)));
411  connect(m_tcpSocket,
412  SIGNAL(error(QAbstractSocket::SocketError)),
413  this,
414  SLOT(slotError(QAbstractSocket::SocketError)));
415  connect(m_tcpSocket,
416  SIGNAL(modeChanged(QSslSocket::SslMode)),
417  this,
418  SLOT(slotModeChanged(QSslSocket::SslMode)));
419  connect(m_tcpSocket,
420  SIGNAL(readyRead(void)),
421  this,
422  SLOT(slotReadyRead(void)));
423  connect(m_tcpSocket,
424  SIGNAL(sslErrors(const QList<QSslError> &)),
425  this,
426  SLOT(slotSslErrors(const QList<QSslError> &)));
427  }
428  else if(m_udpSocket)
429  {
430  /*
431  ** UDP sockets are connection-less. However, most of the communications
432  ** logic requires connected sockets.
433  */
434 
435  m_udpSocket->setSocketState(QAbstractSocket::ConnectedState);
436  connect(m_udpSocket,
437  SIGNAL(disconnected(void)),
438  this,
439  SIGNAL(disconnected(void)));
440  connect(m_udpSocket,
441  SIGNAL(disconnected(void)),
442  this,
443  SLOT(slotDisconnected(void)));
444  connect(m_udpSocket,
445  SIGNAL(error(QAbstractSocket::SocketError)),
446  this,
447  SLOT(slotError(QAbstractSocket::SocketError)));
448  connect(m_udpSocket,
449  SIGNAL(readyRead(void)),
450  this,
451  SLOT(slotReadyRead(void)));
452  }
453 
454  connect(m_externalAddress,
455  SIGNAL(ipAddressDiscovered(const QHostAddress &)),
456  this,
457  SLOT(slotExternalAddressDiscovered(const QHostAddress &)));
458  connect(&m_accountTimer,
459  SIGNAL(timeout(void)),
460  this,
461  SLOT(slotSendAuthenticationRequest(void)));
462  connect(&m_externalAddressDiscovererTimer,
463  SIGNAL(timeout(void)),
464  this,
465  SLOT(slotDiscoverExternalAddress(void)));
466  connect(&m_authenticationTimer,
467  SIGNAL(timeout(void)),
468  this,
469  SLOT(slotAuthenticationTimerTimeout(void)));
470  connect(&m_keepAliveTimer,
471  SIGNAL(timeout(void)),
472  this,
473  SLOT(slotSendCapabilities(void)));
474  connect(&m_lifetime,
475  SIGNAL(timeout(void)),
476  this,
477  SLOT(slotLifetimeExpired(void)));
478  connect(&m_timer,
479  SIGNAL(timeout(void)),
480  this,
481  SLOT(slotTimeout(void)));
482 
483  if(m_useSsl)
484  {
485  if(m_tcpSocket)
486  m_tcpSocket->startServerEncryption();
487  }
488 
489  m_accountTimer.setInterval(2500);
490  m_authenticationTimer.setInterval
491  (spoton_kernel::
492  setting("kernel/server_account_verification_window_msecs",
493  15000).toInt());
494 
495  if(spoton_kernel::setting("gui/kernelExternalIpInterval", -1).
496  toInt() == 30)
497  {
498  m_externalAddress->discover();
499  m_externalAddressDiscovererTimer.start(30000);
500  }
501  else if(spoton_kernel::setting("gui/kernelExternalIpInterval", -1).
502  toInt() == 60)
503  {
504  m_externalAddress->discover();
505  m_externalAddressDiscovererTimer.start(60000);
506  }
507  else
508  m_externalAddressDiscovererTimer.setInterval(30000);
509 
510  if(m_useAccounts.fetchAndAddOrdered(0))
511  if(!m_useSsl)
512  {
513  m_accountTimer.start();
514  m_authenticationTimer.start();
515  }
516 
517  QTimer::singleShot(30000, this, SLOT(slotSendMOTD(void)));
518  m_keepAliveTimer.start(15000);
519  m_lifetime.start(spoton_common::NEIGHBOR_LIFETIME_MS);
520  m_timer.start(2500);
521  start(priority);
522 }

524 spoton_neighbor::spoton_neighbor
525 (const QNetworkProxy &proxy,
526  const QString &ipAddress,
527  const QString &port,
528  const QString &scopeId,
529  const qint64 id,
530  const bool userDefined,
531  const int keySize,
532  const qint64 maximumBufferSize,
533  const qint64 maximumContentLength,
534  const QString &echoMode,
535  const QByteArray &peerCertificate,
536  const bool allowExceptions,
537  const QString &protocol,
538  const bool requireSsl,
539  const QByteArray &accountName,
540  const QByteArray &accountPassword,
541  const QString &transport,
542  const QString &orientation,
543  const QString &motd,
544  const QString &statusControl,
545  const QString &sslControlString,
546  const Priority priority,
547  const int laneWidth,
548  const int passthrough,
549  const int waitforbyteswritten_msecs,
550  const QByteArray &privateApplicationCredentials,
551  const int silenceTime,
552  QObject *parent):QThread(parent)
553 {
554  m_abort = 0;
555  m_accountAuthenticated = 0;
556  m_accountName = accountName;
557  m_accountPassword = accountPassword;
558  m_address = ipAddress.trimmed();
559  m_allowExceptions = allowExceptions;
560  m_bluetoothSocket = 0;
561  m_bytesRead = 0;
562  m_bytesWritten = 0;
563  m_echoMode = echoMode;
564  m_externalAddress = new spoton_external_address(this);
565  m_id = id;
566  m_ipAddress = ipAddress;
567  m_isUserDefined = userDefined;
568  m_kernelInterfaces = spoton_kernel::interfaces();
569  m_keySize = qAbs(keySize);
570 
571  if(transport == "tcp")
572  if(m_keySize != 0)
573  if(!(m_keySize == 2048 || m_keySize == 3072 ||
574  m_keySize == 4096))
575  m_keySize = 2048;
576 
577  m_laneWidth = qBound(spoton_common::LANE_WIDTH_MINIMUM,
578  laneWidth,
579  spoton_common::LANE_WIDTH_MAXIMUM);
580  m_lastReadTime = QDateTime::currentDateTime();
581  m_listenerOid = -1;
582  m_maximumBufferSize =
583  qBound(spoton_common::MAXIMUM_NEIGHBOR_CONTENT_LENGTH,
584  maximumBufferSize,
585  spoton_common::MAXIMUM_NEIGHBOR_BUFFER_SIZE);
586  m_maximumContentLength =
587  qBound(spoton_common::MINIMUM_NEIGHBOR_CONTENT_LENGTH,
588  maximumContentLength,
589  spoton_common::MAXIMUM_NEIGHBOR_CONTENT_LENGTH);
590  m_motd = motd;
591  m_orientation = orientation;
592  m_passthrough = passthrough;
593  m_peerCertificate = QSslCertificate(peerCertificate);
594  m_port = port.toUShort();
595  m_privateApplicationCredentials = privateApplicationCredentials;
596  m_privateApplicationSequences.first = m_privateApplicationSequences.second =
597  1;
598  m_protocol = protocol;
599  m_receivedUuid = "{00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000}";
600  m_requireSsl = requireSsl;
601  m_sctpSocket = 0;
602  m_silenceTime = qBound(5, silenceTime, std::numeric_limits<int>::max());
603  m_sourceOfRandomness = 0;
604  m_sslControlString = sslControlString.trimmed();
605 
606  if(m_sslControlString.isEmpty())
607  m_sslControlString = spoton_common::SSL_CONTROL_STRING;
608 
609  m_startTime = QDateTime::currentDateTime();
610  m_statusControl = statusControl;
611  m_tcpSocket = 0;
612  m_transport = transport;
613  m_udpSocket = 0;
614  m_waitforbyteswritten_msecs =
615  qBound(0,
616  waitforbyteswritten_msecs,
617  spoton_common::WAIT_FOR_BYTES_WRITTEN_MSECS_MAXIMUM);
618 
619  spoton_crypt *s_crypt = spoton_kernel::s_crypts.value("chat", 0);
620 
621  if(s_crypt)
622  {
623  QByteArray name(m_accountName);
624  QByteArray password(m_accountPassword);
625  bool ok = true;
626 
627  name = s_crypt->decryptedAfterAuthenticated(name, &ok);
628 
629  if(ok)
630  password = s_crypt->decryptedAfterAuthenticated(password, &ok);
631 
632  if(ok)
633  m_useAccounts = !name.isEmpty() && !password.isEmpty() ? 1 : 0;
634  else
635  m_useAccounts = 0;
636  }
637  else
638  m_useAccounts = 0;
639 
640  if(m_transport == "tcp")
641  {
642  if(m_keySize != 0)
643  m_useSsl = true;
644  else
645  m_useSsl = false;
646  }
647  else
648  m_useSsl = false;
649 
650  if(m_transport == "bluetooth")
651  {
652  }
653  else if(m_transport == "sctp")
654  m_sctpSocket = new spoton_sctp_socket(this);
655  else if(m_transport == "tcp")
656  m_tcpSocket = new spoton_neighbor_tcp_socket(this);
657  else if(m_transport == "udp")
658  m_udpSocket = new spoton_neighbor_udp_socket(this);
659 
660  if(m_sctpSocket)
661  m_sctpSocket->setReadBufferSize(m_maximumBufferSize);
662  else if(m_tcpSocket)
663  {
664  m_tcpSocket->setProxy(proxy);
665  m_tcpSocket->setReadBufferSize(m_maximumBufferSize);
666  }
667  else if(m_udpSocket)
668  m_udpSocket->setProxy(proxy);
669 
670  QByteArray certificate;
671  QByteArray privateKey;
672  QByteArray publicKey;
673  QString error("");
674 
675  if(m_transport == "tcp" && m_useSsl)
676  {
677  spoton_crypt::generateSslKeys
678  (m_keySize,
679  certificate,
680  privateKey,
681  publicKey,
682  QHostAddress(),
683  0, // Days are not used.
684  error);
685 
686  if(!error.isEmpty())
687  spoton_misc::logError
688  (QString("spoton_neighbor:: "
689  "spoton_neighbor(): "
690  "generateSslKeys() failure (%1) for %2:%3.").
691  arg(error).
692  arg(ipAddress).
693  arg(port));
694  }
695 
696  if(!privateKey.isEmpty())
697  {
698  if(m_tcpSocket)
699  {
700  QSslConfiguration configuration;
701 
702  configuration.setPrivateKey(QSslKey(privateKey, QSsl::Rsa));
703 
704  if(!configuration.privateKey().isNull())
705  {
706 #if QT_VERSION >= 0x040800
707  configuration.setSslOption
708  (QSsl::SslOptionDisableCompression, true);
709  configuration.setSslOption
710  (QSsl::SslOptionDisableEmptyFragments, true);
711  configuration.setSslOption
712  (QSsl::SslOptionDisableLegacyRenegotiation, true);
713  configuration.setSslOption
714  (QSsl::SslOptionDisableSessionTickets, true);
715 #if QT_VERSION >= 0x050200
716  configuration.setSslOption
717  (QSsl::SslOptionDisableSessionPersistence, true);
718  configuration.setSslOption
719  (QSsl::SslOptionDisableSessionSharing, true);
720 #endif
721 #endif
722  configuration.setPeerVerifyMode(QSslSocket::QueryPeer);
723 #if QT_VERSION >= 0x050000
724  spoton_crypt::setSslCiphers
725  (configuration.supportedCiphers(), m_sslControlString,
726  configuration);
727 #else
728  spoton_crypt::setSslCiphers
729  (m_tcpSocket->supportedCiphers(), m_sslControlString,
730  configuration);
731 #endif
732  m_tcpSocket->setSslConfiguration(configuration);
733  }
734  else
735  {
736  m_useSsl = m_requireSsl;
737  spoton_misc::logError
738  (QString("spoton_neighbor::spoton_neighbor(): "
739  "empty private key for %1:%2.").
740  arg(ipAddress).
741  arg(port));
742  }
743  }
744  }
745 
746  if(m_transport != "bluetooth")
747  if(m_address.isEmpty())
748  if(!m_ipAddress.isEmpty())
749  QHostInfo::lookupHost(m_ipAddress,
750  this, SLOT(slotHostFound(const QHostInfo &)));
751

753  m_scopeId = scopeId;
754 
755  if(!m_useSsl)
756  m_sslControlString = "N/A";
757 
758  connect(this,
759  SIGNAL(resetKeepAlive(void)),
760  this,
761  SLOT(slotResetKeepAlive(void)));

764  const QByteArray &,

766  const QByteArray &,

934 spoton_neighbor::~spoton_neighbor()
935 {
936  spoton_misc::logError(QString("Neighbor %1:%2 deallocated.").
937  arg(m_address).
938  arg(m_port));
939  m_abort.fetchAndStoreOrdered(1);
940 
941  QWriteLocker locker(&m_dataMutex);
942 
943  m_data.clear();
944  locker.unlock();
945  m_accountTimer.stop();
946  m_authenticationTimer.stop();
947  m_externalAddressDiscovererTimer.stop();
948  m_keepAliveTimer.stop();
949  m_lifetime.stop();
950  m_timer.stop();
951 
952  if(m_id != -1)
953  {
954  /*
955  ** We must not delete accepted participants (neighbor_oid = -1).
956  */
957 
958  QString connectionName("");
959 
960  {
961  QSqlDatabase db = spoton_misc::database(connectionName);
962 
963  db.setDatabaseName
964  (spoton_misc::homePath() + QDir::separator() +
965  "friends_public_keys.db");
966 
967  if(db.open())
968  {
969  /*
970  ** Remove asymmetric keys that were not completely shared.
971  */
972 
973  QSqlQuery query(db);
974 
975  query.exec("PRAGMA secure_delete = ON");
976  query.prepare("DELETE FROM friends_public_keys WHERE "
977  "neighbor_oid = ?");
978  query.bindValue(0, m_id);
979  query.exec();
980  spoton_misc::purgeSignatureRelationships
981  (db, spoton_kernel::s_crypts.value("chat", 0));
982  }
983 
984  db.close();
985  }
986 
987  QSqlDatabase::removeDatabase(connectionName);
988 
989  {
990  QSqlDatabase db = spoton_misc::database(connectionName);
991 
992  db.setDatabaseName
993  (spoton_misc::homePath() + QDir::separator() + "neighbors.db");
994 
995  if(db.open())
996  {
997  QSqlQuery query(db);
998 
999  query.exec("PRAGMA secure_delete = ON");
1000  query.prepare("DELETE FROM neighbors WHERE "
1001  "OID = ? AND status_control = 'deleted'");
1002  query.bindValue(0, m_id);
1003  query.exec();
1004 
1005  if(spoton_kernel::setting("gui/keepOnlyUserDefinedNeighbors",
1006  true).toBool())
1007  {
1008  query.prepare("DELETE FROM neighbors WHERE "
1009  "OID = ? AND status_control <> 'blocked' AND "
1010  "user_defined = 0");
1011  query.bindValue(0, m_id);
1012  query.exec();
1013  }
1014 
1015  query.prepare("UPDATE neighbors SET "
1016  "account_authenticated = NULL, "
1017  "bytes_read = 0, "
1018  "bytes_written = 0, "
1019  "external_ip_address = NULL, "
1020  "is_encrypted = 0, "
1021  "local_ip_address = NULL, "
1022  "local_port = NULL, "
1023  "ssl_session_cipher = NULL, "
1024  "status = 'disconnected', "
1025  "uptime = 0 "
1026  "WHERE OID = ?");
1027  query.bindValue(0, m_id);
1028  query.exec();
1029  }
1030 
1031  db.close();
1032  }
1033 
1034  QSqlDatabase::removeDatabase(connectionName);
1035  }
1036 
1037  while(!m_privateApplicationFutures.isEmpty())
1038  m_privateApplicationFutures.takeFirst().waitForFinished();
1039 
1040  close();
1041  quit();
1042  wait();
1043 }
1044 
1045 void spoton_neighbor::slotTimeout(void)
1046 {
1047  if(qAbs(m_lastReadTime.secsTo(QDateTime::currentDateTime())) >= m_silenceTime)
1048  {
1049  spoton_misc::logError
1050  (QString("spoton_neighbor::slotTimeout(): "
1051  "aborting because of silent connection for %1:%2.").
1052  arg(m_address).
1053  arg(m_port));
1054  deleteLater();
1055  return;
1056  }
1057 
1058  /*
1059  ** We'll change socket states here.
1060  */
1061 
1062  QString connectionName("");
1063  QString status("");
1064  bool shouldDelete = false;
1065 
1066  {
1067  QSqlDatabase db = spoton_misc::database(connectionName);
1068 
1069  db.setDatabaseName
1070  (spoton_misc::homePath() + QDir::separator() + "neighbors.db");
1071 
1072  if(db.open())
1073  {
1074  saveStatistics(db);
1075 
1076  QSqlQuery query(db);
1077 
1078  query.setForwardOnly(true);
1079  query.prepare("SELECT status_control, "
1080  "sticky, "
1081  "echo_mode, "
1082  "maximum_buffer_size, "
1083  "maximum_content_length, "
1084  "account_name, "
1085  "account_password, "
1086  "ae_token, "
1087  "ae_token_type, "
1088  "ssl_control_string, "
1089  "priority, "
1090  "lane_width, "
1091  "passthrough, "
1092  "waitforbyteswritten_msecs, "
1093  "private_application_credentials, "
1094  "silence_time "
1095  "FROM neighbors WHERE OID = ?");
1096  query.bindValue(0, m_id);
1097 
1098  if(query.exec())
1099  {
1100  if(query.next())
1101  {
1102  status = query.value(0).toString().toLower();
1103 
1104  if(status == "blocked" || status == "disconnected")
1105  {
1106  saveStatus(db, status);
1107  shouldDelete = true;
1108  }
1109  else
1110  {
1111  spoton_crypt *s_crypt =
1112  spoton_kernel::s_crypts.value("chat", 0);
1113 
1114  if(s_crypt)
1115  {
1116  bool ok = true;
1117 
1118  QWriteLocker locker(&m_echoModeMutex);
1119 
1120  m_echoMode = s_crypt->decryptedAfterAuthenticated
1121  (QByteArray::fromBase64(query.value(2).
1122  toByteArray()),
1123  &ok).constData();
1124 
1125  if(!ok)
1126  m_echoMode = "full";
1127 
1128  locker.unlock();
1129 
1130  if(m_isUserDefined)
1131  {
1132  m_adaptiveEchoPair.first =
1133  m_adaptiveEchoPair.second = QByteArray();
1134 
1135  if(!query.isNull(7) && !query.isNull(8))
1136  {
1137  QPair<QByteArray, QByteArray> pair
1138  (QByteArray::fromBase64(query.value(7).
1139  toByteArray()),
1140  QByteArray::fromBase64(query.value(8).
1141  toByteArray()));
1142 
1143  m_adaptiveEchoPair = pair;
1144  }
1145  }
1146 
1147  if(m_isUserDefined &&
1148  !m_accountAuthenticated.fetchAndAddOrdered(0))
1149  {
1150  QByteArray aName;
1151  QByteArray aPassword;
1152  QByteArray name
1153  (QByteArray::fromBase64(query.value(5).
1154  toByteArray()));
1155  QByteArray password
1156  (QByteArray::fromBase64(query.value(6).
1157  toByteArray()));
1158 
1159  {
1160  QReadLocker locker1(&m_accountNameMutex);
1161 
1162  aName = m_accountName;
1163  locker1.unlock();
1164 
1165  QReadLocker locker2(&m_accountPasswordMutex);
1166 
1167  aPassword = m_accountPassword;
1168  locker2.unlock();
1169  }
1170 
1171  if(!spoton_crypt::memcmp(name, aName) ||
1172  !spoton_crypt::memcmp(password, aPassword))
1173  {
1174  bool ok = true;
1175 
1176  {
1177  QWriteLocker locker1
1178  (&m_accountNameMutex);
1179 
1180  m_accountName = name;
1181  locker1.unlock();
1182 
1183  QWriteLocker locker2
1184  (&m_accountPasswordMutex);
1185 
1186  m_accountPassword = password;
1187  locker2.unlock();
1188  }
1189 
1190  name = s_crypt->decryptedAfterAuthenticated
1191  (name, &ok);
1192 
1193  if(ok)
1194  password = s_crypt->
1195  decryptedAfterAuthenticated
1196  (password, &ok);
1197 
1198  if(ok)
1199  {
1200  if(!name.isEmpty() &&
1201  !password.isEmpty())
1202  m_useAccounts.fetchAndStoreOrdered(1);
1203  else
1204  m_useAccounts.fetchAndStoreOrdered(0);
1205  }
1206  else
1207  m_useAccounts.fetchAndStoreOrdered(0);
1208 
1209  if(m_useAccounts.fetchAndAddOrdered(0))
1210  {
1211  m_accountTimer.start();
1212  m_authenticationTimer.start();
1213  }
1214  else
1215  {
1216  m_accountTimer.stop();
1217  m_authenticationTimer.stop();
1218  }
1219  }
1220  }
1221 
1222  if(query.isNull(14))
1223  m_privateApplicationCredentials.clear();
1224  else
1225  m_privateApplicationCredentials = s_crypt->
1226  decryptedAfterAuthenticated
1227  (QByteArray::fromBase64(query.value(14).
1228  toByteArray()),
1229  &ok);
1230  }
1231 
1232  m_laneWidth = qBound
1233  (spoton_common::LANE_WIDTH_MINIMUM,
1234  query.value(11).toInt(),
1235  spoton_common::LANE_WIDTH_MAXIMUM);
1236 
1237  QWriteLocker locker1(&m_maximumBufferSizeMutex);
1238 
1239  m_maximumBufferSize =
1240  qBound(spoton_common::MAXIMUM_NEIGHBOR_CONTENT_LENGTH,
1241  query.value(3).toLongLong(),
1242  spoton_common::MAXIMUM_NEIGHBOR_BUFFER_SIZE);
1243  locker1.unlock();
1244 
1245  QWriteLocker locker2(&m_maximumContentLengthMutex);
1246 
1247  m_maximumContentLength =
1248  qBound(spoton_common::MINIMUM_NEIGHBOR_CONTENT_LENGTH,
1249  query.value(4).toLongLong(),
1250  spoton_common::MAXIMUM_NEIGHBOR_CONTENT_LENGTH);
1251  locker2.unlock();
1252 
1253  if(isRunning())
1254  {
1255  Priority p = priority();
1256  Priority q = HighPriority;
1257 
1258  q = Priority(query.value(10).toInt());
1259 
1260  if(q < 0 || q > 7)
1261  q = HighPriority;
1262 
1263  if(isRunning() && p != q)
1264  setPriority(q);
1265  }
1266 
1267  m_passthrough = query.value(12).toInt();
1268  m_silenceTime = qBound
1269  (5,
1270  query.value(15).toInt(),
1271  std::numeric_limits<int>::max());
1272  m_sslControlString = query.value(9).toString();
1273 
1274  if(m_sslControlString.isEmpty())
1275  {
1276  if(m_useSsl)
1277  m_sslControlString =
1278  spoton_common::SSL_CONTROL_STRING;
1279  else
1280  m_sslControlString = "N/A";
1281  }
1282  else if(!m_useSsl)
1283  m_sslControlString = "N/A";
1284 
1285  m_waitforbyteswritten_msecs = qBound
1286  (0,
1287  query.value(13).toInt(),
1288  spoton_common::WAIT_FOR_BYTES_WRITTEN_MSECS_MAXIMUM);
1289  }
1290 
1291  if(query.value(1).toLongLong())
1292  m_lifetime.stop();
1293  else if(!m_lifetime.isActive())
1294  m_lifetime.start();
1295  }
1296  else if(m_id != -1)
1297  shouldDelete = true;
1298  }
1299  else if(m_id != -1)
1300  shouldDelete = true;
1301  }
1302 
1303  db.close();
1304  }
1305 
1306  QSqlDatabase::removeDatabase(connectionName);
1307 
1308  if(shouldDelete)
1309  {
1310  spoton_misc::logError
1311  (QString("spoton_neighbor::slotTimeout(): instructed "
1312  "to delete neighbor for %1:%2.").
1313  arg(m_address).
1314  arg(m_port));
1315  deleteLater();
1316  return;
1317  }
1318 
1319  m_kernelInterfaces.fetchAndStoreOrdered(spoton_kernel::interfaces());
1320 
1321  if(m_isUserDefined)
1322  if(status == "connected")
1323  {
1324  if(m_transport == "bluetooth")
1325  {
1326  if(!m_bluetoothSocket)
1327  {
1328 #if QT_VERSION >= 0x050200 && defined(SPOTON_BLUETOOTH_ENABLED)
1329  m_bluetoothSocket = new (std::nothrow) QBluetoothSocket
1330  (QBluetoothServiceInfo::RfcommProtocol, this);
1331 
1332  if(m_bluetoothSocket)
1333  {
1334  QByteArray bytes;
1335  QString serviceUuid;
1336 
1337  bytes.append(QString("%1").arg(m_port).
1338  toLatin1().toHex());
1339  bytes = bytes.rightJustified(12, '0');
1340  serviceUuid.append(bytes.mid(0, 8).constData());
1341  serviceUuid.append("-");
1342  serviceUuid.append(bytes.mid(8).constData());
1343  serviceUuid.append("-0000-0000-");
1344  serviceUuid.append(QString(m_address).remove(":"));
1345  saveStatus("connecting");
1346  m_bluetoothSocket->connectToService
1347  (QBluetoothAddress(m_address),
1348  QBluetoothUuid(serviceUuid));
1349  connect(m_bluetoothSocket,
1350  SIGNAL(connected(void)),
1351  this,
1352  SLOT(slotConnected(void)));
1353  connect(m_bluetoothSocket,
1354  SIGNAL(disconnected(void)),
1355  this,
1356  SIGNAL(disconnected(void)));
1357  connect(m_bluetoothSocket,
1358  SIGNAL(disconnected(void)),
1359  this,
1360  SLOT(slotDisconnected(void)));
1361  connect(m_bluetoothSocket,
1362  SIGNAL(error(QBluetoothSocket::SocketError)),
1363  this,
1364  SLOT(slotError(QBluetoothSocket::SocketError)));
1365  connect(m_bluetoothSocket,
1366  SIGNAL(readyRead(void)),
1367  this,
1368  SLOT(slotReadyRead(void)));
1369  }
1370 #endif
1371  }
1372  }
1373  else if(m_sctpSocket)
1374  {
1375  if(m_sctpSocket->state() == spoton_sctp_socket::UnconnectedState)
1376  {
1377  saveStatus("connecting");
1378  m_sctpSocket->connectToHost(m_address, m_port);
1379  }
1380  }
1381  else if(m_tcpSocket)
1382  {
1383  if(m_tcpSocket->state() == QAbstractSocket::UnconnectedState)
1384  {
1385  saveStatus("connecting");
1386 
1387  if(m_useSsl)
1388  m_tcpSocket->connectToHostEncrypted(m_address, m_port);
1389  else
1390  m_tcpSocket->connectToHost(m_address, m_port);
1391  }
1392  }
1393  else if(m_udpSocket)
1394  {
1395  if(m_udpSocket->state() == QAbstractSocket::UnconnectedState)
1396  {
1397  saveStatus("connecting");
1398  m_udpSocket->connectToHost(m_address, m_port);
1399 
1400  int timeout = 2500;
1401 
1402  if(m_udpSocket->proxy().type() != QNetworkProxy::NoProxy)
1403  timeout = 5000;
1404 
1405  if(!m_udpSocket->waitForConnected(timeout))
1406  {
1407  spoton_misc::logError
1408  (QString("spoton_neighbor::slotTimeout(): "
1409  "waitForConnected() failure for "
1410  "%1:%2.").
1411  arg(m_address).
1412  arg(m_port));
1413  deleteLater();
1414  return;
1415  }
1416  }
1417  }
1418  }
1419 
1420  int v = spoton_kernel::setting
1421  ("gui/kernelExternalIpInterval", -1).toInt();
1422 
1423  if(v != -1)
1424  {
1425  v *= 1000;
1426 
1427  if(v == 30000)
1428  {
1429  if(m_externalAddressDiscovererTimer.interval() != v)
1430  m_externalAddressDiscovererTimer.start(30000);
1431  else if(!m_externalAddressDiscovererTimer.isActive())
1432  m_externalAddressDiscovererTimer.start(30000);
1433  }
1434  else
1435  {
1436  if(m_externalAddressDiscovererTimer.interval() != v)
1437  m_externalAddressDiscovererTimer.start(60000);
1438  else if(!m_externalAddressDiscovererTimer.isActive())
1439  m_externalAddressDiscovererTimer.start(60000);
1440  }
1441  }
1442  else
1443  {
1444  if(m_externalAddress)
1445  m_externalAddress->clear();
1446 
1447  m_externalAddressDiscovererTimer.stop();
1448  }
1449 
1450  for(int i = m_privateApplicationFutures.size() - 1; i >= 0; i--)
1451  if(m_privateApplicationFutures.at(i).isFinished())
1452  m_privateApplicationFutures.removeAt(i);
1453 
1454  /*
1455  ** Remove learned adaptive echo tokens that are not contained
1456  ** in the complete set of adaptive echo tokens.
1457  */
1458 
1459  QSet<QPair<QByteArray, QByteArray> > a;
1460  QSet<QPair<QByteArray, QByteArray> > b
1461  (spoton_kernel::adaptiveEchoTokens().toSet());
1462  QWriteLocker locker2(&m_learnedAdaptiveEchoPairsMutex);
1463 
1464  a = m_learnedAdaptiveEchoPairs.toSet();
1465  m_learnedAdaptiveEchoPairs =
1466  QList<QPair<QByteArray, QByteArray> >::fromSet(a.intersect(b));
1467 
1468  if(!m_isUserDefined &&
1469  !m_passthrough &&
1470  m_privateApplicationCredentials.isEmpty())
1471  if(m_sourceOfRandomness > 0)
1472  if(readyToWrite())
1473  write(spoton_crypt::weakRandomBytes(m_sourceOfRandomness).constData(),
1474  m_sourceOfRandomness);
1475 }

1477 void spoton_neighbor::saveStatistics(const QSqlDatabase &db)
1478 {
1479  if(!db.isOpen())
1480  {
1481  spoton_misc::logError
1482  ("spoton_neighbor::saveStatistics(): db is closed.");
1483  return;
1484  }
1485  else if(m_id == -1)
1486  {
1487  spoton_misc::logError
1488  ("spoton_neighbor::saveStatistics(): m_id is -1.");
1489  return;
1490  }
1491 
1492  QSqlQuery query(db);
1493  QSslCipher cipher;
1494  bool ok = true;
1495 
1496  if(m_tcpSocket)
1497  cipher = m_tcpSocket->sessionCipher();
1498 
1499  qint64 seconds = qAbs(m_startTime.secsTo(QDateTime::currentDateTime()));
1500 
1501  query.exec("PRAGMA synchronous = OFF");
1502  query.prepare("UPDATE neighbors SET "
1503  "bytes_read = ?, "
1504  "bytes_written = ?, "
1505  "is_encrypted = ?, "
1506  "ssl_session_cipher = ?, "
1507  "uptime = ? "
1508  "WHERE OID = ? AND "
1509  "status = 'connected' "
1510  "AND ABS(? - uptime) >= 10");
1511  query.bindValue(0, m_bytesRead);
1512 
1513  QReadLocker locker(&m_bytesWrittenMutex);
1514 
1515  query.bindValue(1, m_bytesWritten);
1516  locker.unlock();
1517  query.bindValue(2, isEncrypted() ? 1 : 0);
1518 
1519  if(cipher.isNull() || !spoton_kernel::s_crypts.value("chat", 0))
1520  query.bindValue(3, QVariant::String);
1521  else
1522  {
1523  query.bindValue
1524  (3, spoton_kernel::s_crypts.value("chat")->
1525  encryptedThenHashed(QString("%1-%2-%3-%4-%5-%6-%7").
1526  arg(cipher.name()).
1527  arg(cipher.authenticationMethod()).
1528  arg(cipher.encryptionMethod()).
1529  arg(cipher.keyExchangeMethod()).
1530  arg(cipher.protocolString()).
1531  arg(cipher.supportedBits()).
1532  arg(cipher.usedBits()).toUtf8(), &ok).
1533  toBase64());
1534 
1535  if(!ok)
1536  query.bindValue(3, QVariant::String);
1537  }
1538 
1539  query.bindValue(4, seconds);
1540  query.bindValue(5, m_id);
1541  query.bindValue(6, seconds);
1542 
1543  if(ok)
1544  query.exec();
1545 }

1632 
1633 void spoton_neighbor::slotReadyRead(void)
1634 {
1635  if(m_abort.fetchAndAddOrdered(0))
1636  return;
1637 
1638  QByteArray data;
1639 
1640  if(m_bluetoothSocket)
1641  {
1642 #if QT_VERSION >= 0x050200 && defined(SPOTON_BLUETOOTH_ENABLED)
1643  data = m_bluetoothSocket->readAll();
1644 #endif
1645  }
1646  else if(m_sctpSocket)
1647  data = m_sctpSocket->readAll();
1648  else if(m_tcpSocket)
1649  data = m_tcpSocket->readAll();
1650  else if(m_udpSocket)
1651  {
1652  data = m_udpSocket->readAll();
1653 
1654  while(m_udpSocket->multicastSocket() &&
1655  m_udpSocket->multicastSocket()->hasPendingDatagrams())
1656  {
1657  QByteArray datagram;
1658  qint64 size = 0;
1659 
1660  datagram.resize
1661  (static_cast<int> (qMax(static_cast<qint64> (0),
1662  m_udpSocket->multicastSocket()->
1663  pendingDatagramSize())));
1664  size = m_udpSocket->multicastSocket()->readDatagram
1665  (datagram.data(), datagram.size(), 0, 0);
1666 
1667  if(size > 0)
1668  data.append(datagram.mid(0, static_cast<int> (size)));
1669  }
1670  }
1671 
1672  m_bytesRead += static_cast<quint64> (data.length());
1673 
1674  {
1675  QWriteLocker locker
1676  (&spoton_kernel::s_totalNeighborsBytesReadWrittenMutex);
1677 
1678  spoton_kernel::s_totalNeighborsBytesReadWritten.first +=
1679  static_cast<quint64> (data.length());
1680  }
1681 
1682  if(!data.isEmpty() && !isEncrypted() && m_useSsl)
1683  {
1684  data.clear();
1685  spoton_misc::logError
1686  (QString("spoton_neighbor::slotReadyRead(): "
1687  "m_useSsl is true, however, isEncrypted() "
1688  "is false "
1689  "for %1:%2. "
1690  "Purging read data.").
1691  arg(m_address).
1692  arg(m_port));
1693  }
1694 
1695  if(!data.isEmpty())
1696  if(m_passthrough)
1697  {
1698  /*
1699  ** A private application may not be able to authenticate.
1700  */
1701 
1702  if(!m_privateApplicationCredentials.isEmpty())
1703  {
1704  if(m_isUserDefined)
1705  {
1706  QMutexLocker locker(&m_privateApplicationMutex);
1707  quint64 sequence = m_privateApplicationSequences.first;
1708 
1709  m_privateApplicationSequences.first += 1;
1710  locker.unlock();
1711  m_privateApplicationFutures << QtConcurrent::run
1712  (this,
1713  &spoton_neighbor::bundlePrivateApplicationData,
1714  data,
1715  m_privateApplicationCredentials,
1716  m_id,
1717  sequence);
1718  }
1719  else
1720  {
1721  QMutexLocker locker(&m_privateApplicationMutex);
1722  quint64 sequence = m_privateApplicationSequences.second;
1723 
1724  m_privateApplicationSequences.second += 1;
1725  locker.unlock();
1726  m_privateApplicationFutures << QtConcurrent::run
1727  (this,
1728  &spoton_neighbor::bundlePrivateApplicationData,
1729  data,
1730  m_privateApplicationCredentials,
1731  m_id,
1732  sequence);
1733  }
1734 
1735  return;
1736  }
1737 
1738  bool ok = true;
1739 
1740  if(m_useAccounts.fetchAndAddOrdered(0))
1741  if(!m_accountAuthenticated.fetchAndAddOrdered(0))
1742  ok = false;
1743 
1744  if(ok)
1745  {
1746  /*
1747  ** We cannot safely inspect duplicate bytes.
1748  ** For example, an 'a' followed by another 'a' may
1749  ** be acceptable.
1750  */
1751 
1752  emit receivedMessage(data, m_id, QPair<QByteArray, QByteArray> ());
1753  emit resetKeepAlive();
1754  return;
1755  }
1756  }
1757 
1758  if(!data.isEmpty() || m_udpSocket)
1759  {
1760  QReadLocker locker1(&m_maximumBufferSizeMutex);
1761  qint64 maximumBufferSize = m_maximumBufferSize;
1762 
1763  locker1.unlock();
1764 
1765  QWriteLocker locker2(&m_dataMutex);
1766  int length = static_cast<int> (maximumBufferSize) - m_data.length();
1767 
1768  if(length > 0)
1769  m_data.append(data.mid(0, length));
1770 
1771  if(!m_data.isEmpty())
1772  {
1773  locker2.unlock();
1774  emit newData();
1775  }
1776  }
1777  else
1778  {
1779  spoton_misc::logError
1780  (QString("spoton_neighbor::slotReadyRead(): "
1781  "Did not receive data. Closing connection for "
1782  "%1:%2.").
1783  arg(m_address).
1784  arg(m_port));
1785  deleteLater();
1786  }
1787 }
1788 
1789 void spoton_neighbor::processData(void)
1790 {
1791  if(m_abort.fetchAndAddOrdered(0))
1792  return;
1793 
1794  QByteArray data;
1795 
1796  {
1797  QReadLocker locker(&m_dataMutex);
1798 
1799  data = m_data;
1800  }
1801 
1802  QList<QByteArray> list;
1803  bool reset_keep_alive = false;
1804  int index = -1;
1805  int totalBytes = 0;
1806 
1807  while((index = data.indexOf(spoton_send::EOM)) >= 0)
1808  {
1809  if(m_abort.fetchAndAddOrdered(0))
1810  return;
1811 
1812  QByteArray bytes(data.mid(0, index + spoton_send::EOM.length()));
1813 
1814  data.remove(0, bytes.length());
1815  totalBytes += bytes.length();
1816 
1817  if(!bytes.isEmpty())
1818  {
1819  if(!spoton_kernel::messagingCacheContains(bytes))
1820  list.append(bytes);
1821  else
1822  reset_keep_alive = true;
1823  }
1824  }
1825 
1826  if(reset_keep_alive)
1827  emit resetKeepAlive();
1828 
1829  if(totalBytes > 0)
1830  {
1831  QWriteLocker locker(&m_dataMutex);
1832 
1833  m_data.remove(0, totalBytes);
1834  }
1835 
1836  data.clear();
1837 
1838  qint64 maximumBufferSize = 0;
1839 
1840  {
1841  QReadLocker locker(&m_maximumBufferSizeMutex);
1842 
1843  maximumBufferSize = m_maximumBufferSize;
1844  }
1845 
1846  {
1847  QWriteLocker locker(&m_dataMutex);
1848 
1849  if(m_data.length() >= maximumBufferSize)
1850  m_data.clear();
1851  }
1852 
1853  if(list.isEmpty())
1854  return;
1855 
1856  QByteArray accountClientSentSalt;
1857  QString echoMode("");
1858  bool useAccounts = false;
1859  qint64 maximumContentLength = 0;
1860 
1861  {
1862  QReadLocker locker(&m_accountClientSentSaltMutex);
1863 
1864  accountClientSentSalt = m_accountClientSentSalt;
1865  }
1866 
1867  {
1868  QReadLocker locker(&m_echoModeMutex);
1869 
1870  echoMode = m_echoMode;
1871  }
1872 
1873  {
1874  QReadLocker locker(&m_maximumContentLengthMutex);
1875 
1876  maximumContentLength = m_maximumContentLength;
1877  }
1878 
1879  useAccounts = m_useAccounts.fetchAndAddOrdered(0);
1880 
1881  while(!list.isEmpty())
1882  {
1883  if(m_abort.fetchAndAddOrdered(0))
1884  return;
1885 
1886  QByteArray data(list.takeFirst());
1887  QByteArray originalData(data);
1888  int index = -1;
1889  int length = 0;
1890 
1891  if((index = data.indexOf("Content-Length: ")) >= 0)
1892  {
1893  QByteArray contentLength
1894  (data.mid(index + static_cast<int> (qstrlen("Content-Length: "))));
1895 
1896  if((index = contentLength.indexOf("\r\n")) >= 0)
1897  /*
1898  ** toInt() returns zero on failure.
1899  */
1900 
1901  length = contentLength.mid(0, index).toInt();
1902  }
1903  else
1904  {
1905  spoton_misc::logError
1906  (QString("spoton_neighbor::processData(): "
1907  "data does not contain Content-Length "
1908  "from node %1:%2.").
1909  arg(m_address).
1910  arg(m_port));
1911  continue;
1912  }
1913 
1914  if(length <= 0)
1915  {
1916  spoton_misc::logError
1917  (QString("spoton_neighbor::processData(): "
1918  "negative or zero length from node %1:%2. "
1919  "Ignoring.").
1920  arg(m_address).
1921  arg(m_port));
1922  continue;
1923  }
1924 
1925  if(length > maximumContentLength)
1926  {
1927  spoton_misc::logError
1928  (QString("spoton_neighbor::processData(): "
1929  "the Content-Length header from node %1:%2 "
1930  "contains a lot of data (%3). Ignoring.").
1931  arg(m_address).
1932  arg(m_port).
1933  arg(length));
1934  continue;
1935  }
1936 
1937  if(!m_isUserDefined)
1938  {
1939  /*
1940  ** We're a server!
1941  */
1942 
1943  if(useAccounts)
1944  {
1945  if(length > 0 && data.contains("type=0050&content="))
1946  if(!m_accountAuthenticated.fetchAndAddOrdered(0))
1947  process0050(length, data);
1948 
1949  if(!m_accountAuthenticated.fetchAndAddOrdered(0))
1950  continue;
1951  }
1952  else if(length > 0 && (data.contains("type=0050&content=") ||
1953  data.contains("type=0051&content=") ||
1954  data.contains("type=0052&content=")))
1955  continue;
1956  }
1957  else if(useAccounts &&
1958  length > 0 && data.contains("type=0051&content="))
1959  {
1960  /*
1961  ** The server responded. Let's determine if the server's
1962  ** response is valid. What if the server solicits a response
1963  ** without the client having requested the authentication?
1964  */
1965 
1966  if(!m_accountAuthenticated.fetchAndAddOrdered(0))
1967  if(accountClientSentSalt.length() >=
1968  spoton_common::ACCOUNTS_RANDOM_BUFFER_SIZE)
1969  process0051(length, data);
1970 
1971  if(!m_accountAuthenticated.fetchAndAddOrdered(0))
1972  continue;
1973  }
1974  else if(length > 0 && data.contains("type=0052&content="))
1975  {
1976  if(!m_accountAuthenticated.fetchAndAddOrdered(0))
1977  {
1978  if(m_bluetoothSocket)
1979  {
1980 #if QT_VERSION >= 0x050200 && defined(SPOTON_BLUETOOTH_ENABLED)
1981  emit authenticationRequested
1982  (QString("%1:%2").
1983  arg(m_bluetoothSocket->peerAddress().toString()).
1984  arg(m_bluetoothSocket->peerPort()));
1985 #endif
1986  }
1987  else if(m_sctpSocket)
1988  {
1989  if(m_sctpSocket->peerAddress().scopeId().isEmpty())
1990  emit authenticationRequested
1991  (QString("%1:%2").
1992  arg(m_sctpSocket->peerAddress().toString()).
1993  arg(m_sctpSocket->peerPort()));
1994  else
1995  emit authenticationRequested
1996  (QString("%1:%2:%3").
1997  arg(m_sctpSocket->peerAddress().toString()).
1998  arg(m_sctpSocket->peerPort()).
1999  arg(m_sctpSocket->peerAddress().scopeId()));
2000  }
2001  else if(m_tcpSocket)
2002  {
2003  if(m_tcpSocket->peerAddress().scopeId().isEmpty())
2004  emit authenticationRequested
2005  (QString("%1:%2").
2006  arg(m_tcpSocket->peerAddress().toString()).
2007  arg(m_tcpSocket->peerPort()));
2008  else
2009  emit authenticationRequested
2010  (QString("%1:%2:%3").
2011  arg(m_tcpSocket->peerAddress().toString()).
2012  arg(m_tcpSocket->peerPort()).
2013  arg(m_tcpSocket->peerAddress().scopeId()));
2014  }
2015  else if(m_udpSocket)
2016  {
2017  if(m_udpSocket->peerAddress().scopeId().isEmpty())
2018  emit authenticationRequested
2019  (QString("%1:%2").
2020  arg(m_udpSocket->peerAddress().toString()).
2021  arg(m_udpSocket->peerPort()));
2022  else
2023  emit authenticationRequested
2024  (QString("%1:%2:%3").
2025  arg(m_udpSocket->peerAddress().toString()).
2026  arg(m_udpSocket->peerPort()).
2027  arg(m_udpSocket->peerAddress().scopeId()));
2028  }
2029  }
2030  }
2031 
2032  if(m_isUserDefined)
2033  if(useAccounts)
2034  {
2035  if(!m_accountAuthenticated.fetchAndAddOrdered(0))
2036  continue;
2037  }
2038 
2039  if(length > 0 && data.contains("type=0011&content="))
2040  process0011(length, data);
2041  else if(length > 0 && data.contains("type=0012&content="))
2042  process0012(length, data);
2043  else if(length > 0 && data.contains("type=0014&content="))
2044  process0014(length, data);
2045  else if(length > 0 && data.contains("type=0030&content="))
2046  process0030(length, data);
2047  else if(length > 0 && (data.contains("type=0050&content=") ||
2048  data.contains("type=0051&content=") ||
2049  data.contains("type=0052&content=")))
2050  /*
2051  ** We shouldn't be here!
2052  */
2053 
2054  continue;
2055  else if(length > 0 && data.contains("type=0065&content="))
2056  process0065(length, data);
2057  else if(length > 0 && data.contains("type=0070&content="))
2058  process0070(length, data);
2059  else if(length > 0 && data.contains("content="))
2060  {
2061  /*
2062  ** Remove some header data.
2063  */
2064 
2065  length -= static_cast<int> (qstrlen("content="));
2066 
2067  int indexOf = data.lastIndexOf("\r\n");
2068 
2069  if(indexOf > -1)
2070  data = data.mid(0, indexOf + 2);
2071 
2072  indexOf = data.indexOf("content=");
2073 
2074  if(indexOf > -1)
2075  data.remove(0, indexOf + static_cast<int> (qstrlen("content=")));
2076 
2077  if(data.length() == length)
2078  {
2079  emit resetKeepAlive();
2080  spoton_kernel::messagingCacheAdd(originalData);
2081  }
2082  else
2083  {
2084  spoton_misc::logError
2085  (QString("spoton_neighbor::processData(): "
2086  "data length does not equal content length "
2087  "from node %1:%2. Ignoring.").
2088  arg(m_address).
2089  arg(m_port));
2090  continue;
2091  }
2092 
2093  /*
2094  ** Please note that findMessageType() calls
2095  ** participantCount(). Therefore, the process() methods
2096  ** that would do not.
2097  */
2098 
2099  QList<QByteArray> symmetricKeys;
2100  QPair<QByteArray, QByteArray> discoveredAdaptiveEchoPair;
2101 
2102  /*
2103  ** The findMessageType() method does not detect StarBeam
2104  ** data.
2105  */
2106 
2107  QString messageType(findMessageType(data, symmetricKeys,
2108  discoveredAdaptiveEchoPair));
2109 
2110  if(messageType == "0000")
2111  process0000(length, data, symmetricKeys);
2112  else if(messageType == "0000a" || messageType == "0000c")
2113  process0000a(length, data, messageType);
2114  else if(messageType == "0000b")
2115  process0000b(length, data, symmetricKeys);
2116  else if(messageType == "0000d")
2117  process0000d(length, data, symmetricKeys);
2118  else if(messageType == "0001a")
2119  process0001a(length, data);
2120  else if(messageType == "0001b")
2121  process0001b(length, data, symmetricKeys);
2122  else if(messageType == "0001c")
2123  process0001c(length, data, symmetricKeys);
2124  else if(messageType == "0002a")
2125  process0002a(length, data, discoveredAdaptiveEchoPair);
2126  else if(messageType == "0002b")
2127  process0002b
2128  (length, data, symmetricKeys, discoveredAdaptiveEchoPair);
2129  else if(messageType == "0013")
2130  process0013(length, data, symmetricKeys);
2131  else if(messageType == "0040a")
2132  process0040a(length, data, symmetricKeys);
2133  else if(messageType == "0040b")
2134  process0040b(length, data, symmetricKeys);
2135  else if(messageType == "0080")
2136  process0080(length, data, symmetricKeys);
2137  else if(messageType == "0090")
2138  process0090(length, data, symmetricKeys);
2139  else if(messageType == "0091a")
2140  process0091a(length, data, symmetricKeys);
2141  else if(messageType == "0091b")
2142  process0091b(length, data, symmetricKeys);
2143  else
2144  messageType.clear();
2145 
2146  if(messageType.isEmpty() && data.trimmed().split('\n').size() == 3)
2147  if(spoton_kernel::instance() &&
2148  spoton_kernel::instance()->
2149  processPotentialStarBeamData(data, discoveredAdaptiveEchoPair))
2150  {
2151  if(!discoveredAdaptiveEchoPair.first.isEmpty() &&
2152  !discoveredAdaptiveEchoPair.second.isEmpty())
2153  {
2154  QWriteLocker locker(&m_learnedAdaptiveEchoPairsMutex);
2155 
2156  if(!m_learnedAdaptiveEchoPairs.
2157  contains(discoveredAdaptiveEchoPair))
2158  m_learnedAdaptiveEchoPairs.
2159  append(discoveredAdaptiveEchoPair);
2160  }
2161 
2162  messageType = "0060";
2163  }
2164 
2165  if(spoton_kernel::setting("gui/scramblerEnabled", false).toBool())
2166  emit scrambleRequest();
2167 
2168  if(discoveredAdaptiveEchoPair == QPair<QByteArray, QByteArray> () &&
2169  spoton_kernel::setting("gui/superEcho", 1).toInt() != 1)
2170  {
2171  /*
2172  ** Super Echo!
2173  */
2174 
2175  if(messageType != "0060") // StarBeam
2176  emit receivedMessage
2177  (originalData, m_id, QPair<QByteArray, QByteArray> ());
2178  }
2179  else if(echoMode == "full")
2180  {
2181  if(messageType == "0001b" &&
2182  data.trimmed().split('\n').size() == 7)
2183  emit receivedMessage
2184  (originalData, m_id, discoveredAdaptiveEchoPair);
2185  else if(messageType.isEmpty() ||
2186  messageType == "0002b" ||
2187  messageType == "0090")
2188  emit receivedMessage
2189  (originalData, m_id, discoveredAdaptiveEchoPair);
2190  else if(messageType == "0040a" || messageType == "0040b")
2191  /*
2192  ** Buzz.
2193  */
2194 
2195  emit receivedMessage
2196  (originalData, m_id, QPair<QByteArray, QByteArray> ());
2197  else if(messageType == "0060" &&
2198  !discoveredAdaptiveEchoPair.first.isEmpty() &&
2199  !discoveredAdaptiveEchoPair.second.isEmpty())
2200  emit receivedMessage
2201  (originalData, m_id, discoveredAdaptiveEchoPair);
2202  }
2203  }
2204  }
2205 }

2421 void spoton_neighbor::savePublicKey(const QByteArray &keyType,
2422  const QByteArray &name,
2423  const QByteArray &publicKey,
2424  const QByteArray &signature,
2425  const QByteArray &sPublicKey,
2426  const QByteArray &sSignature,
2427  const qint64 neighbor_oid,
2428  const bool ignore_key_permissions,
2429  const bool signatures_required,
2430  const QString &messageType)
2431 {
2432  spoton_crypt *s_crypt = spoton_kernel::s_crypts.value(keyType, 0);
2433 
2434  if(spoton_crypt::exists(publicKey, s_crypt) ||
2435  spoton_crypt::exists(sPublicKey, s_crypt))
2436  {
2437  spoton_misc::logError("spoton_neighbor::savePublicKey(): "
2438  "attempting to add my own public key(s).");
2439  return;
2440  }
2441 
2442  if(keyType == "chat" || keyType == "poptastic")
2443  {
2444  if(!ignore_key_permissions)
2445  if(!spoton_kernel::setting("gui/acceptChatKeys", false).toBool())
2446  return;
2447  }
2448  else if(keyType == "email")
2449  {
2450  if(!ignore_key_permissions)
2451  if(!spoton_kernel::setting("gui/acceptEmailKeys", false).toBool())
2452  return;
2453  }
2454  else if(keyType == "rosetta")
2455  {
2456  if(!ignore_key_permissions)
2457  /*
2458  ** Only echo key-share allows sharing of Rosetta key pairs.
2459  */
2460 
2461  return;
2462  }
2463  else if(keyType == "url")
2464  {
2465  if(!ignore_key_permissions)
2466  if(!spoton_kernel::setting("gui/acceptUrlKeys", false).toBool())
2467  return;
2468  }
2469  else
2470  {
2471  spoton_misc::logError
2472  (QString("spoton_neighbor::savePublicKey(): unexpected key type "
2473  "for %1:%2.").
2474  arg(m_address).
2475  arg(m_port));
2476  return;
2477  }
2478 
2479  int noid = neighbor_oid;
2480 
2481  /*
2482  ** Save a friendly key.
2483  */
2484 
2485  if(signatures_required)
2486  if(!spoton_crypt::isValidSignature(publicKey, publicKey, signature))
2487  if(messageType == "0090")
2488  noid = 0;
2489 
2490  if(signatures_required)
2491  if(!spoton_crypt::isValidSignature(sPublicKey, sPublicKey, sSignature))
2492  if(messageType == "0090")
2493  noid = 0;
2494 
2495  /*
2496  ** If noid (neighbor_oid) is -1, we have bonded two neighbors.
2497  */
2498 
2499  QString connectionName("");
2500 
2501  {
2502  QSqlDatabase db = spoton_misc::database(connectionName);
2503 
2504  db.setDatabaseName
2505  (spoton_misc::homePath() + QDir::separator() +
2506  "friends_public_keys.db");
2507 
2508  if(db.open())
2509  {
2510  if(noid != -1)
2511  {
2512  /*
2513  ** We have received a request for friendship.
2514  ** Do we already have the neighbor's public key?
2515  */
2516 
2517  QSqlQuery query(db);
2518  bool exists = false;
2519  bool ok = true;
2520 
2521  query.setForwardOnly(true);
2522  query.prepare("SELECT neighbor_oid "
2523  "FROM friends_public_keys "
2524  "WHERE public_key_hash = ?");
2525  query.bindValue(0, spoton_crypt::sha512Hash(publicKey,
2526  &ok).toBase64());
2527 
2528  if(ok)
2529  if(query.exec())
2530  if(query.next())
2531  if(query.value(0).toLongLong() == -1)
2532  exists = true;
2533 
2534  if(!exists)
2535  {
2536  /*
2537  ** An error occurred or we do not have the public key.
2538  */
2539 
2540  spoton_misc::saveFriendshipBundle
2541  (keyType, name, publicKey, sPublicKey,
2542  noid, db, s_crypt);
2543  spoton_misc::saveFriendshipBundle
2544  (keyType + "-signature", name, sPublicKey,
2545  QByteArray(), noid, db, s_crypt);
2546  }
2547  }
2548  else
2549  {
2550  spoton_misc::saveFriendshipBundle
2551  (keyType, name, publicKey, sPublicKey, -1, db, s_crypt);
2552  spoton_misc::saveFriendshipBundle
2553  (keyType + "-signature", name, sPublicKey, QByteArray(), -1,
2554  db, s_crypt);
2555  }
2556  }
2557 
2558  db.close();
2559  }
2560 
2561  QSqlDatabase::removeDatabase(connectionName);
2562 }

2577 {

2579  return;

2584  spoton_kernel::s_crypts.
2585  value("chat", 0)));
2586

2588

2592  spoton_misc::logError

2628 void spoton_neighbor::slotWrite
2629 (const QByteArray &data, const qint64 id,
2630  const QPairByteArrayByteArray &adaptiveEchoPair)
2631 {
2632  /*
2633  ** A neighbor (id) received a message. The neighbor now needs
2634  ** to send the message to its peers.
2635  */
2636 
2637  if(data.length() > m_laneWidth)
2638  return;
2639 
2640  if(id == m_id)
2641  return;
2642 
2643  if(m_passthrough && !m_privateApplicationCredentials.isEmpty())
2644  {
2645  m_privateApplicationFutures << QtConcurrent::run
2646  (this,
2647  &spoton_neighbor::parsePrivateApplicationData,
2648  data,
2649  m_privateApplicationCredentials,
2650  m_maximumContentLength);
2651  return;
2652  }
2653 
2654  QReadLocker locker1(&m_learnedAdaptiveEchoPairsMutex);
2655 
2656  if(!(adaptiveEchoPair == QPair<QByteArray, QByteArray> () ||
2657  m_learnedAdaptiveEchoPairs.contains(adaptiveEchoPair)))
2658  return;
2659 
2660  locker1.unlock();
2661 
2662  QReadLocker locker2(&m_echoModeMutex);
2663  QString echoMode(m_echoMode);
2664 
2665  locker2.unlock();
2666 
2667  if(echoMode == "full")
2668  if(readyToWrite())
2669  {
2670  if(write(data.constData(), data.length()) != data.length())
2671  spoton_misc::logError
2672  (QString("spoton_neighbor::slotWrite(): write() "
2673  "error for %1:%2.").
2674  arg(m_address).
2675  arg(m_port));
2676  else if(m_passthrough && !m_privateApplicationCredentials.isEmpty())
2677  spoton_kernel::messagingCacheAdd(data + QByteArray::number(id));
2678  else
2679  spoton_kernel::messagingCacheAdd(data);
2680  }
2681 }

3572 
3573  if(length == data.length())
3574  {
3575  data = data.trimmed();
3576 
3577  QList<QByteArray> list(data.split('\n'));
3578 
3579  if(list.size() != 3)
3580  {
3581  spoton_misc::logError
3582  (QString("spoton_neighbor::process0002b(): "
3583  "received irregular data. Expecting 3 entries, "
3584  "received %1.").arg(list.size()));
3585  return;
3586  }
3587 
3588  bool ok = true;
3589 
3590  for(int i = 0; i < list.size(); i++)
3591  list.replace(i, QByteArray::fromBase64(list.at(i)));
3592 
3593  /*
3594  ** We must do some sort of thinking.
3595  ** Remember, we may receive multiple mail requests. And we may
3596  ** have many letters for the requesting parties. How should
3597  ** we retrieve the letters in a timely, yet functional, manner?
3598  */
3599 
3600  /*
3601  ** symmetricKeys[0]: Encryption Key
3602  ** symmetricKeys[1]: Encryption Type
3603  ** symmetricKeys[2]: Hash Key
3604  ** symmetricKeys[3]: Hash Type
3605  */
3606 
3607  QByteArray computedHash;
3608  QByteArray data(list.value(0));
3609 
3610  computedHash = spoton_crypt::keyedHash
3611  (data, symmetricKeys.value(2), symmetricKeys.value(3), &ok);
3612 
3613  if(ok)
3614  {
3615  QByteArray messageCode(list.value(1));
3616 
3617  if(!computedHash.isEmpty() && !messageCode.isEmpty() &&
3618  spoton_crypt::memcmp(computedHash, messageCode))
3619  {
3620  spoton_crypt crypt(symmetricKeys.value(1),
3621  "sha512",
3622  QByteArray(),
3623  symmetricKeys.value(0),
3624  0,
3625  0,
3626  "");
3627 
3628  data = crypt.decrypted(data, &ok);
3629 
3630  if(ok)
3631  {
3632  QList<QByteArray> list(data.split('\n'));
3633 
3634  for(int i = 0; i < list.size(); i++)
3635  list.replace
3636  (i, QByteArray::fromBase64(list.at(i)));
3637 
3638  if(list.size() == 6 &&
3639  list.value(1).size() >= 64 &&
3640  list.value(3).size() >= 64)
3641  {
3642  if(list.value(0) == "0002b")
3643  {
3644  QByteArray publicKeyHash
3645  (spoton_misc::findPublicKeyHashGivenHash
3646  (list.value(1), list.value(2),
3647  symmetricKeys.value(2),
3648  symmetricKeys.value(3), s_crypt));
3649 
3650  if(!publicKeyHash.isEmpty())
3651  {
3652  saveParticipantStatus
3653  (publicKeyHash); // Public Key Hash
3654  emit retrieveMail
3655  (list.value(0) +
3656  list.value(1) +
3657  list.value(2) +
3658  list.value(3) +
3659  list.value(4), // Data
3660  publicKeyHash, // Public Key Hash
3661  list.value(4), // Timestamp
3662  list.value(5), // Signature
3663  adaptiveEchoPair);
3664  }
3665  }
3666  else
3667  spoton_misc::logError
3668  ("spoton_neighbor::process0002b(): "
3669  "message type does not match 0002b.");
3670  }
3671  else
3672  {
3673  if(list.size() != 6)
3674  spoton_misc::logError
3675  (QString("spoton_neighbor::process0002b(): "
3676  "received irregular data. "
3677  "Expecting 6 "
3678  "entries, "
3679  "received %1.").arg(list.size()));
3680  else
3681  spoton_misc::logError
3682  ("spoton_neighbor::process0002b(): "
3683  "received irregular data. "
3684  "Expecting larger messages.");
3685  }
3686  }
3687  }
3688  else
3689  spoton_misc::logError("spoton_neighbor::process0002b(): "
3690  "computed message code does "
3691  "not match provided code.");
3692  }
3693  }
3694  else
3695  spoton_misc::logError
3696  (QString("spoton_neighbor::process0002b(): 0002b "
3697  "Content-Length mismatch (advertised: %1, received: %2) "
3698  "for %3:%4.").
3699  arg(length).arg(data.length()).
3700  arg(m_address).

5060 void spoton_neighbor::slotError(QAbstractSocket::SocketError error)
5061 {
5062  if(error == QAbstractSocket::DatagramTooLargeError)
5063  return;
5064  else if(error == QAbstractSocket::SslHandshakeFailedError)
5065  {
5066  /*
5067  ** Do not use SSL.
5068  */
5069 
5070  if(!m_requireSsl)
5071  {
5072  m_sslControlString = "N/A";
5073  m_useSsl = false;
5074 
5075  if(m_tcpSocket)
5076  spoton_misc::logError
5077  (QString("spoton_neighbor::slotError(): socket error "
5078  "(%1) for "
5079  "%2:%3. "
5080  "Disabling SSL.").arg(m_tcpSocket->errorString()).
5081  arg(m_address).arg(m_port));
5082 
5083  return;
5084  }
5085  }
5086 
5087  if(m_tcpSocket)
5088  spoton_misc::logError
5089  (QString("spoton_neighbor::slotError(): "
5090  "socket error (%1) for %2:%3. "
5091  "Aborting socket.").arg(m_tcpSocket->errorString()).
5092  arg(m_address).
5093  arg(m_port));
5094  else if(m_udpSocket)
5095  spoton_misc::logError
5096  (QString("spoton_neighbor::slotError(): "
5097  "socket error (%1) for %2:%3. "
5098  "Aborting socket.").arg(m_udpSocket->errorString()).
5099  arg(m_address).
5100  arg(m_port));
5101 
5102  deleteLater();
5103 }

5201 void spoton_neighbor::saveExternalAddress(const QHostAddress &address,
5202  const QSqlDatabase &db)
5203 {
5204  if(!db.isOpen())
5205  return;
5206  else if(m_id == -1)
5207  return;
5208 
5209  QAbstractSocket::SocketState state = this->state();
5210  QSqlQuery query(db);
5211  bool ok = true;
5212 
5213  if(state == QAbstractSocket::ConnectedState)
5214  {
5215  if(address.isNull())
5216  {
5217  query.prepare("UPDATE neighbors SET "
5218  "external_ip_address = NULL "
5219  "WHERE OID = ? AND external_ip_address IS "
5220  "NOT NULL");
5221  query.bindValue(0, m_id);
5222  }
5223  else
5224  {
5225  spoton_crypt *s_crypt =
5226  spoton_kernel::s_crypts.value("chat", 0);
5227 
5228  if(s_crypt)
5229  {
5230  query.prepare("UPDATE neighbors SET external_ip_address = ? "
5231  "WHERE OID = ?");
5232  query.bindValue
5233  (0, s_crypt->encryptedThenHashed(address.toString().
5234  toLatin1(), &ok).
5235  toBase64());
5236  query.bindValue(1, m_id);
5237  }
5238  else
5239  ok = false;
5240  }
5241  }
5242  else if(state == QAbstractSocket::UnconnectedState)
5243  {
5244  query.prepare("UPDATE neighbors SET external_ip_address = NULL "
5245  "WHERE OID = ? AND external_ip_address IS NOT NULL");
5246  query.bindValue(0, m_id);
5247  }
5248 
5249  if(ok)
5250  query.exec();
5251 }

5287 void spoton_neighbor::slotSendMail
5288 (const QPairByteArrayInt64List &list, const QString &messageType)
5289 {
5290  if(m_passthrough && !m_privateApplicationCredentials.isEmpty())
5291  return;
5292 
5293  QList<qint64> oids;
5294 
5295  if(readyToWrite())
5296  for(int i = 0; i < list.size(); i++)
5297  {
5298  QByteArray message;
5299  QPair<QByteArray, QByteArray> ae
5300  (spoton_misc::decryptedAdaptiveEchoPair(m_adaptiveEchoPair,
5301  spoton_kernel::s_crypts.
5302  value("chat", 0)));
5303  QPair<QByteArray, qint64> pair(list.at(i));
5304 
5305  if(messageType == "0001a")
5306  message = spoton_send::message0001a(pair.first, ae);
5307  else if (messageType == "0001b")
5308  message = spoton_send::message0001b(pair.first, ae);
5309  else
5310  message = spoton_send::message0001c(pair.first, ae);
5311 
5312  if(write(message.constData(), message.length()) != message.length())
5313  spoton_misc::logError
5314  (QString("spoton_neighbor::slotSendMail(): write() "
5315  "error for %1:%2.").
5316  arg(m_address).
5317  arg(m_port));
5318  else
5319  {
5320  /*
5321  ** We may need to store the letter that this node sent if
5322  ** the node is also a post office box.
5323  ** Almost-anonymous e-mail shall not be archived.
5324  */
5325 
5326  if(messageType != "0001c")
5327  if(spoton_kernel::setting("gui/postoffice_enabled",
5328  false).toBool())
5329  {
5330  QWriteLocker locker(&m_dataMutex);
5331 
5332  m_data.append(message);
5333  locker.unlock();
5334  processData();
5335  }
5336 
5337  oids.append(pair.second);
5338  spoton_kernel::messagingCacheAdd(message);
5339  }
5340  }
5341 
5342  if(!oids.isEmpty())
5343  {
5344  spoton_crypt *s_crypt = spoton_kernel::s_crypts.value("email", 0);
5345 
5346  spoton_mailer::moveSentMailToSentFolder(oids, s_crypt);
5347  }
5348 }
5349 
5350 void spoton_neighbor::slotSendMailFromPostOffice
5351 (const QByteArray &data,
5352  const QPairByteArrayByteArray &adaptiveEchoPair)
5353 {
5354  if(m_passthrough && !m_privateApplicationCredentials.isEmpty())
5355  return;

5358 
5359  QReadLocker locker(&m_learnedAdaptiveEchoPairsMutex);
5360 
5361  if(adaptiveEchoPair == QPair<QByteArray, QByteArray> () ||
5362  m_learnedAdaptiveEchoPairs.contains(adaptiveEchoPair))
5363  adaptiveEcho = true;
5364 
5365  locker.unlock();
5366 
5367  if(adaptiveEcho && readyToWrite())
5368  {
5369  QByteArray message;
5370  QPair<QByteArray, QByteArray> ae
5371  (spoton_misc::decryptedAdaptiveEchoPair(m_adaptiveEchoPair,
5372  spoton_kernel::s_crypts.

5380  "error for %1:%2.").
5381  arg(m_address).

5388 void spoton_neighbor::storeLetter(const QByteArray &symmetricKey,
5389  const QByteArray &symmetricKeyAlgorithm,
5390  const QByteArray &hashKey,
5391  const QByteArray &hashKeyAlgorithm,
5392  const QByteArray &senderPublicKeyHash,
5393  const QByteArray &name,
5394  const QByteArray &subject,
5395  const QByteArray &message,
5396  const QByteArray &date,
5397  const QByteArray &attachmentData,
5398  const QByteArray &signature,
5399  const bool goldbugUsed)
5400 {
5401  QFileInfo fileInfo(spoton_misc::homePath() + QDir::separator() +
5402  "email.db");
5403  qint64 maximumSize = 1048576 * spoton_kernel::setting
5404  ("gui/maximumEmailFileSize", 1024).toLongLong();
5405 
5406  if(fileInfo.size() >= maximumSize)
5407  {
5408  spoton_misc::logError("spoton_neighbor::storeLetter(): "
5409  "email.db has exceeded the specified limit.");
5410  return;
5411  }
5412 
5413  spoton_crypt *s_crypt = spoton_kernel::s_crypts.value("email", 0);
5414 
5415  if(!s_crypt)
5416  return;
5417 
5418  if(!spoton_misc::isAcceptedParticipant(senderPublicKeyHash, "email",
5419  s_crypt))
5420  return;
5421 
5422  if(!goldbugUsed &&
5423  spoton_kernel::setting("gui/emailAcceptSignedMessagesOnly",
5424  true).toBool())

5426  isValidSignature("0001b" +

5441  ("spoton_neighbor::storeLetter(): invalid signature.");
5442  return;
5443  }
5444 
5445  /*
5446  ** We need to remember that the information here may have been
5447  ** encoded with a goldbug. The interface will prompt the user
5448  ** for the symmetric key.
5449  */
5450 
5451  if(!spoton_misc::isAcceptedParticipant(senderPublicKeyHash, "email",
5452  s_crypt))
5453  return;
5454 
5455  if(goldbugUsed)
5456  saveParticipantStatus(senderPublicKeyHash);
5457  else
5458  saveParticipantStatus(name, senderPublicKeyHash);
5459 
5460  QByteArray attachmentData_l(attachmentData);
5461  QByteArray date_l(date);
5462  QByteArray message_l(message);
5463  QByteArray name_l(name);
5464  QByteArray subject_l(subject);
5465  QString connectionName("");
5466  bool goldbugUsed_l = goldbugUsed;
5467 
5468  if(goldbugUsed_l)
5469  {
5470  {
5471  QSqlDatabase db = spoton_misc::database(connectionName);
5472 
5473  db.setDatabaseName(spoton_misc::homePath() + QDir::separator() +
5474  "friends_public_keys.db");
5475 
5476  if(db.open())
5477  {
5478  QSqlQuery query(db);
5479  bool ok = true;
5480 
5481  query.setForwardOnly(true);
5482  query.prepare
5483  ("SELECT forward_secrecy_authentication_algorithm, "
5484  "forward_secrecy_authentication_key, "
5485  "forward_secrecy_encryption_algorithm, "
5486  "forward_secrecy_encryption_key FROM "
5487  "friends_public_keys WHERE "
5488  "neighbor_oid = -1 AND "
5489  "public_key_hash = ?");
5490  query.bindValue(0, senderPublicKeyHash.toBase64());
5491 
5492  if(query.exec() && query.next())
5493  if(!query.isNull(0) && !query.isNull(1) &&
5494  !query.isNull(2) && !query.isNull(3))
5495  {
5496  QByteArray aa;
5497  QByteArray ak;
5498  QByteArray ea;
5499  QByteArray ek;
5500  QByteArray magnet;
5501 
5502  if(ok)
5503  aa = s_crypt->decryptedAfterAuthenticated
5504  (QByteArray::fromBase64(query.value(0).
5505  toByteArray()),
5506  &ok);
5507 
5508  if(ok)
5509  ak = s_crypt->decryptedAfterAuthenticated
5510  (QByteArray::fromBase64(query.value(1).
5511  toByteArray()),
5512  &ok);
5513 
5514  if(ok)
5515  ea = s_crypt->decryptedAfterAuthenticated
5516  (QByteArray::fromBase64(query.value(2).
5517  toByteArray()),
5518  &ok);

5520  if(ok)

5522  (QByteArray::fromBase64(query.value(3).

5524  &ok);

5533  (magnet);

5566  */

5925 void spoton_neighbor::slotPeerVerifyError(const QSslError &error)
5926 {
5927  /*
5928  ** This method may be called several times!
5929  */
5930 
5931  bool shouldDelete = true;
5932 
5933  if(error.error() == QSslError::CertificateUntrusted ||
5934  error.error() == QSslError::HostNameMismatch ||
5935  error.error() == QSslError::SelfSignedCertificate)
5936  shouldDelete = false;
5937 
5938  if(shouldDelete)
5939  {
5940  spoton_misc::logError
5941  (QString("spoton_neighbor::slotPeerVerifyError(): instructed "
5942  "to delete neighbor for %1:%2.").
5943  arg(m_address).
5944  arg(m_port));
5945  deleteLater();
5946  return;
5947  }
5948 
5949  if(!m_allowExceptions)
5950  if(m_isUserDefined)
5951  if(m_tcpSocket)
5952  if(!m_peerCertificate.isNull() &&
5953  !m_tcpSocket->peerCertificate().isNull())
5954  if(!m_peerCertificate.toPem().isEmpty() &&
5955  !m_tcpSocket->peerCertificate().toPem().isEmpty())
5956  if(!spoton_crypt::memcmp(m_peerCertificate.toPem(),
5957  m_tcpSocket->peerCertificate().toPem()))
5958  {
5959  spoton_misc::logError
5960  (QString("spoton_neighbor::slotPeerVerifyError(): "
5961  "the stored certificate does not match "
5962  "the peer's certificate for %1:%2. This is a "
5963  "serious problem! Aborting.").
5964  arg(m_address).
5965  arg(m_port));
5966  deleteLater();
5967  }
5968 }

6018 void spoton_neighbor::recordCertificateOrAbort(void)
6019 {
6020  QSslCertificate certificate;
6021  bool save = false;
6022 
6023  if(m_isUserDefined)
6024  {
6025  if(m_tcpSocket)
6026  {
6027  if(m_peerCertificate.isNull() &&
6028  !m_tcpSocket->peerCertificate().isNull())
6029  {
6030  certificate = m_peerCertificate = m_tcpSocket->peerCertificate();
6031  save = true;
6032  }
6033  else if(!m_allowExceptions)
6034  {
6035  if(m_tcpSocket->peerCertificate().isNull())
6036  {
6037  spoton_misc::logError
6038  (QString("spoton_neighbor::recordCertificateOrAbort(): "
6039  "null peer certificate for %1:%2. Aborting.").
6040  arg(m_address).
6041  arg(m_port));
6042  deleteLater();
6043  return;
6044  }
6045  else if(!spoton_crypt::
6046  memcmp(m_peerCertificate.toPem(),
6047  m_tcpSocket->peerCertificate().toPem()))
6048  {
6049  spoton_misc::logError
6050  (QString("spoton_neighbor::recordCertificateOrAbort(): "
6051  "the stored certificate does not match "
6052  "the peer's certificate for %1:%2. This is a "
6053  "serious problem! Aborting.").
6054  arg(m_address).
6055  arg(m_port));
6056  deleteLater();
6057  return;
6058  }
6059  }
6060  }
6061  }
6062  else
6063  {
6064  if(m_tcpSocket)
6065  certificate = m_tcpSocket->sslConfiguration().localCertificate();
6066 
6067  save = true;
6068  }
6069 
6070  if(!save)
6071  return;
6072 
6073  spoton_crypt *s_crypt = spoton_kernel::s_crypts.value("chat", 0);
6074 
6075  if(!s_crypt)
6076  return;
6077 
6078  QString connectionName("");
6079 
6080  {
6081  QSqlDatabase db = spoton_misc::database(connectionName);
6082 
6083  db.setDatabaseName
6084  (spoton_misc::homePath() + QDir::separator() + "neighbors.db");
6085 
6086  if(db.open())
6087  {
6088  QSqlQuery query(db);
6089  bool ok = true;
6090 
6091  query.prepare
6092  ("UPDATE neighbors SET certificate = ? WHERE OID = ?");
6093  query.bindValue
6094  (0, s_crypt->encryptedThenHashed(certificate.toPem(),
6095  &ok).toBase64());
6096  query.bindValue(1, m_id);
6097 
6098  if(ok)
6099  query.exec();
6100  }
6101 
6102  db.close();
6103  }
6104 
6105  QSqlDatabase::removeDatabase(connectionName);
6106 }
