6175 
6176 QString spoton_neighbor::findMessageType
6177 (const QByteArray &data,
6178  QList<QByteArray> &symmetricKeys,
6179  QPair<QByteArray, QByteArray> &discoveredAdaptiveEchoPair)
6180 {
6181  QList<QByteArray> list(data.trimmed().split('\n'));
6182  QString type("");
6183  int interfaces = m_kernelInterfaces.fetchAndAddOrdered(0);
6184  spoton_crypt *s_crypt = spoton_kernel::s_crypts.value("chat", 0);
6185 
6186  /*
6187  ** list[0]: Data
6188  ** ...
6189  ** list[list.size - 1]: Adaptive Echo Data
6190  ** symmetricKeys[0]: Encryption Key
6191  ** symmetricKeys[1]: Encryption Type
6192  ** symmetricKeys[2]: Hash Key
6193  ** symmetricKeys[3]: Hash Type
6194  */
6195 
6196  for(int i = 0; i < list.size(); i++)
6197  list.replace(i, QByteArray::fromBase64(list.at(i)));
6198 
6199  /*
6200  ** Do not attempt to locate a Buzz key if an interface is not
6201  ** attached to the kernel.
6202  */
6203 
6204  if(interfaces > 0 && list.size() == 2)
6205  {
6206  symmetricKeys = spoton_kernel::findBuzzKey(list.value(0), list.value(1));
6207 
6208  if(!symmetricKeys.isEmpty())
6209  {
6210  QByteArray data;
6211  bool ok = true;
6212  spoton_crypt crypt(symmetricKeys.value(1),
6213  "sha512",
6214  QByteArray(),
6215  symmetricKeys.value(0),
6216  0,
6217  0,
6218  "");
6219 
6220  data = crypt.decrypted(list.value(0), &ok);
6221 
6222  if(ok)
6223  {
6224  QByteArray a;
6225  QDataStream stream(&data, QIODevice::ReadOnly);
6226 
6227  stream >> a;
6228 
6229  if(stream.status() == QDataStream::Ok)
6230  type = a;
6231  }
6232 
6233  if(type == "0040a" || type == "0040b")
6234  goto done_label;
6235  else
6236  {
6237  symmetricKeys.clear();
6238  type.clear();
6239  }
6240  }
6241  }
6242 
6243  /*
6244  ** Do not attempt to locate a gemini if an interface is not
6245  ** attached to the kernel.
6246  */
6247 
6248  if(interfaces > 0 && list.size() == 3 && s_crypt &&
6249  spoton_misc::participantCount("chat", s_crypt) > 0)
6250  {
6251  QPair<QByteArray, QByteArray> gemini
6252  (spoton_misc::
6253  findGeminiInCosmos(list.value(0), list.value(1), s_crypt));
6254 
6255  if(!gemini.first.isEmpty())
6256  {
6257  QByteArray data;
6258  bool ok = true;
6259  spoton_crypt crypt("aes256",
6260  "sha512",
6261  QByteArray(),
6262  gemini.first,
6263  0,
6264  0,
6265  "");
6266 
6267  data = crypt.decrypted(list.value(0), &ok);
6268 
6269  if(ok)
6270  {
6271  QByteArray a;
6272  QDataStream stream(&data, QIODevice::ReadOnly);
6273 
6274  stream >> a;
6275 
6276  if(stream.status() == QDataStream::Ok)
6277  type = a;
6278  }
6279 
6280  if(type == "0000" || type == "0000b" || type == "0013")
6281  {
6282  symmetricKeys.append(gemini.first);
6283  symmetricKeys.append("aes256");
6284  symmetricKeys.append(gemini.second);
6285  symmetricKeys.append("sha512");
6286  goto done_label;
6287  }
6288  else
6289  type.clear();
6290  }
6291  }
6292 
6293  if(list.size() == 3 && s_crypt)
6294  {
6295  symmetricKeys = spoton_misc::findEchoKeys
6296  (list.value(0), list.value(1), type, s_crypt);
6297 
6298  if(type == "0090")
6299  goto done_label;
6300  else
6301  {
6302  symmetricKeys.clear();
6303  type.clear();
6304  }
6305  }
6306 
6307  /*
6308  ** Attempt to decipher the message via our private key.
6309  ** We would like to determine the message type only if we have at least
6310  ** one interface attached to the kernel or if we're processing
6311  ** a letter.
6312  */
6313 
6314  if(interfaces > 0 && list.size() == 4 && s_crypt)
6315  if(!spoton_misc::allParticipantsHaveGeminis())
6316  if(spoton_misc::participantCount("chat", s_crypt) > 0)
6317  {
6318  QByteArray data;
6319  bool ok = true;
6320 
6321  data = s_crypt->publicKeyDecrypt(list.value(0), &ok);
6322 
6323  if(ok)
6324  {
6325  QByteArray a;
6326  QDataStream stream(&data, QIODevice::ReadOnly);
6327 
6328  stream >> a;
6329 
6330  if(stream.status() == QDataStream::Ok)
6331  type = a;
6332  }
6333 
6334  if(type == "0000" || type == "0000a" ||
6335  type == "0000c" || type == "0013")
6336  goto done_label;
6337  else
6338  type.clear();
6339  }
6340 
6341  if(list.size() == 3 || list.size() == 7)
6342  /*
6343  ** 0001b
6344  ** 0002b
6345  */
6346 
6347  if(spoton_misc::participantCount("email",
6348  spoton_kernel::s_crypts.
6349  value("email", 0)) > 0)
6350  {
6351  if(list.size() == 3)
6352  symmetricKeys = spoton_kernel::findInstitutionKey
6353  (list.value(0), list.value(1));
6354  else
6355  symmetricKeys = spoton_kernel::findInstitutionKey
6356  (list.value(0) +
6357  list.value(1) +
6358  list.value(2) +
6359  list.value(3) +
6360  list.value(4),
6361  list.value(5));
6362 
6363  if(!symmetricKeys.isEmpty())
6364  {
6365  if(list.size() == 3)
6366  type = "0002b";
6367  else
6368  type = "0001b";
6369 
6370  goto done_label;
6371  }
6372  }
6373 
6374  if(list.size() == 4 || list.size() == 7)
6375  if((s_crypt = spoton_kernel::s_crypts.value("email", 0)))
6376  if(spoton_misc::participantCount("email", s_crypt) > 0)
6377  {
6378  QByteArray data;
6379  bool ok = true;
6380 
6381  data = s_crypt->publicKeyDecrypt(list.value(0), &ok);
6382 
6383  if(ok)
6384  type = QByteArray::fromBase64(data.split('\n').value(0));
6385 
6386  if(type == "0001a" || type == "0001b" || type == "0002a")
6387  {
6388  QList<QByteArray> list(data.split('\n'));
6389 
6390  for(int i = 0; i < list.size(); i++)
6391  list.replace(i, QByteArray::fromBase64(list.at(i)));
6392 
6393  symmetricKeys.append(list.value(1));
6394  symmetricKeys.append(list.value(3));
6395  symmetricKeys.append(list.value(2));
6396  symmetricKeys.append(list.value(4));
6397  goto done_label;
6398  }
6399  else
6400  type.clear();
6401  }
6402 
6403  if(list.size() == 4)
6404  if((s_crypt = spoton_kernel::s_crypts.value("url", 0)))
6405  if(spoton_misc::participantCount("url", s_crypt) > 0)
6406  {
6407  QByteArray data;
6408  bool ok = true;
6409 
6410  data = s_crypt->publicKeyDecrypt(list.value(0), &ok);
6411 
6412  if(ok)
6413  {
6414  QByteArray a;
6415  QDataStream stream(&data, QIODevice::ReadOnly);
6416 
6417  stream >> a;
6418 
6419  if(stream.status() == QDataStream::Ok)
6420  type = a;
6421 
6422  if(type == "0080")
6423  {
6424  QList<QByteArray> list;
6425 
6426  for(int i = 0; i < 4; i++)
6427  {
6428  stream >> a;
6429 
6430  if(stream.status() != QDataStream::Ok)
6431  {
6432  list.clear();
6433  type.clear();
6434  break;
6435  }
6436  else
6437  list.append(a);
6438  }
6439 
6440  if(!type.isEmpty())
6441  {
6442  symmetricKeys.append(list.value(0));
6443  symmetricKeys.append(list.value(2));
6444  symmetricKeys.append(list.value(1));
6445  symmetricKeys.append(list.value(3));
6446  goto done_label;
6447  }
6448  }
6449  else
6450  type.clear();
6451  }
6452  }
6453 
6454  if(list.size() == 4)
6455  {
6456  QStringList types;
6457 
6458  types << "chat" << "email";
6459 
6460  for(int i = 0; i < types.size(); i++)
6461  {
6462  s_crypt = spoton_kernel::s_crypts.value(types.at(i), 0);
6463 
6464  if(!s_crypt)
6465  continue;
6466 
6467  if(spoton_misc::participantCount(types.at(i), s_crypt) <= 0)
6468  continue;
6469 
6470  QByteArray data;
6471  bool ok = true;
6472 
6473  data = s_crypt->publicKeyDecrypt(list.value(0), &ok);
6474 
6475  if(ok)
6476  {
6477  QByteArray a;
6478  QDataStream stream(&data, QIODevice::ReadOnly);
6479 
6480  stream >> a;
6481 
6482  if(stream.status() == QDataStream::Ok)
6483  type = a;
6484 
6485  if((interfaces > 0 && type == "0091a") || type == "0091b")
6486  {
6487  QList<QByteArray> list;
6488 
6489  for(int i = 0; i < 4; i++)
6490  {
6491  stream >> a;
6492 
6493  if(stream.status() != QDataStream::Ok)
6494  {
6495  list.clear();
6496  type.clear();
6497  break;
6498  }
6499  else
6500  list.append(a);
6501  }
6502 
6503  if(!type.isEmpty())
6504  {
6505  symmetricKeys.append(list.value(0));
6506  symmetricKeys.append(list.value(2));
6507  symmetricKeys.append(list.value(1));
6508  symmetricKeys.append(list.value(3));
6509  goto done_label;
6510  }
6511  }
6512  else
6513  type.clear();
6514  }
6515  }
6516  }
6517 
6518  if(list.size() == 3 && (s_crypt = spoton_kernel::s_crypts.value("email", 0)))
6519  symmetricKeys = spoton_misc::findForwardSecrecyKeys
6520  (list.value(0),
6521  list.value(1),
6522  type,
6523  s_crypt);
6524 
6525  done_label:
6526  spoton_kernel::discoverAdaptiveEchoPair
6527  (data.trimmed(), discoveredAdaptiveEchoPair);
6528 
6529  if(!discoveredAdaptiveEchoPair.first.isEmpty() &&
6530  !discoveredAdaptiveEchoPair.second.isEmpty())
6531  {
6532  QWriteLocker locker(&m_learnedAdaptiveEchoPairsMutex);
6533 
6534  if(!m_learnedAdaptiveEchoPairs.contains(discoveredAdaptiveEchoPair))
6535  m_learnedAdaptiveEchoPairs.append(discoveredAdaptiveEchoPair);
6536  }
6537 
6538  return type;
6539 }

6605 void spoton_neighbor::saveGemini(const QByteArray &publicKeyHash,
6606  const QByteArray &gemini,
6607  const QByteArray &geminiHashKey,
6608  const QByteArray &timestamp,
6609  const QByteArray &signature,

6613  ** Some of the following is similar to logic in

6646  gemini +
6647  geminiHashKey))
6648  {
6649  spoton_misc::logError
6650  (QString("spoton_neighbor::saveGemini(): duplicate keys, "
6651  "message type %1.").arg(messageType));

6666  if(db.open())
6667  {
6668  QByteArray bytes1;
6669  QByteArray bytes2;

6673  bool respond = false;
6674

6676  geminis.second = geminiHashKey;
6677 
6678  if(messageType == "0000a")

6681  spoton_crypt::cipherKeyLength("aes256") / 2 &&
6682  geminiHashKey.length() ==
6683  spoton_crypt::XYZ_DIGEST_OUTPUT_SIZE_IN_BYTES / 2)
6684  {
6685  bytes1 = spoton_crypt::strongRandomBytes
6686  (spoton_crypt::cipherKeyLength("aes256") / 2);
6687  bytes2 = spoton_crypt::strongRandomBytes
6688  (spoton_crypt::XYZ_DIGEST_OUTPUT_SIZE_IN_BYTES / 2);
6689  geminis.first.append(bytes1);
6690  geminis.second.append(bytes2);
6691  respond = true;
6692  }
6693 
6694  if(messageType == "0000c")
6695  if(!gemini.isEmpty() && !geminiHashKey.isEmpty())
6696  if(static_cast<size_t> (gemini.length()) ==
6697  spoton_crypt::cipherKeyLength("aes256") / 2 &&
6698  geminiHashKey.length() ==
6699  spoton_crypt::XYZ_DIGEST_OUTPUT_SIZE_IN_BYTES / 2)
6700  {
6701  /*
6702  ** We may be processing a two-way call.
6703  */
6704 
6705  spoton_crypt *s_crypt =
6706  spoton_kernel::s_crypts.value("chat", 0);
6707

6709  {
6710  query.setForwardOnly(true);

6712  "FROM friends_public_keys WHERE "

6721  (QByteArray::fromBase64(query.value(0).
6722  toByteArray()),

6724

6729  toByteArray()),
6730  &ok);
6731

6733  {

6735  ** This is a response.
6736  */

6739  (bytes1.mid(0, gemini.length()));
6740  geminis.second.prepend
6741  (bytes2.mid(0, geminiHashKey.length()));

6743  }
6744  }
6745  }
6746

6748  "gemini = ?, gemini_hash_key = ?, "
6749  "last_status_update = ?, status = 'online' "
6750  "WHERE neighbor_oid = -1 AND "
6751  "public_key_hash = ?");

6756  query.bindValue(1, QVariant(QVariant::String));

6761  spoton_kernel::s_crypts.value("chat", 0);

6777  query.bindValue(1, QVariant(QVariant::String));
6778  }
6779  }
6780 
6781  query.bindValue
6782  (2, QDateTime::currentDateTime().toString(Qt::ISODate));
6783  query.bindValue(3, publicKeyHash.toBase64());
6784 
6785  if(ok)
6786  if(query.exec())
6787  {
6788  QString notsigned("");
6789 
6790  if(signature.isEmpty())
6791  notsigned = " (unsigned)";
6792 
6793  if(geminis.first.isEmpty() ||
6794  geminis.second.isEmpty())
6795  emit statusMessageReceived
6796  (publicKeyHash,
6797  tr("The participant %1...%2 terminated%3 the call.").
6798  arg(publicKeyHash.toBase64().mid(0, 16).constData()).

6800  arg(notsigned));
6801  else if(messageType == "0000a")
6802  {
6803  if(respond)
6804  emit statusMessageReceived
6805  (publicKeyHash,
6806  tr("The participant %1...%2 may have "
6807  "initiated a two-way call%3. Response dispatched.").
6808  arg(publicKeyHash.toBase64().mid(0, 16).constData()).
6809  arg(publicKeyHash.toBase64().right(16).constData()).
6810  arg(notsigned));
6811  else
6812  emit statusMessageReceived
6813  (publicKeyHash,
6814  tr("The participant %1...%2 initiated a call%3.").
6815  arg(publicKeyHash.toBase64().mid(0, 16).constData()).
6816  arg(publicKeyHash.toBase64().right(16).constData()).
6817  arg(notsigned));
6818  }
6819  else if(messageType == "0000b")
6820  emit statusMessageReceived
6821  (publicKeyHash,
6822  tr("The participant %1...%2 initiated a call%3 "
6823  "within a call.").
6824  arg(publicKeyHash.toBase64().mid(0, 16).constData()).
6825  arg(publicKeyHash.toBase64().right(16).constData()).
6826  arg(notsigned));
6827  else if(messageType == "0000c")
6828  emit statusMessageReceived
6829  (publicKeyHash,
6830  tr("Received a two-way call response%1 from "
6831  "participant %2...%3.").

7001 qint64 spoton_neighbor::write(const char *data, const qint64 size)
7002 {
7003  if(!data || size < 0)
7004  return -1;
7005  else if(size == 0)
7006  return 0;
7007 
7008  qint64 minimum = qMin
7009  (static_cast<qint64> (spoton_common::MAXIMUM_UDP_DATAGRAM_SIZE), size);
7010  qint64 remaining = size;
7011  qint64 sent = 0;
7012 
7013  while(remaining > 0)
7014  {
7015  if(m_bluetoothSocket)
7016  {
7017 #if QT_VERSION >= 0x050200 && defined(SPOTON_BLUETOOTH_ENABLED)
7018  sent = m_bluetoothSocket->write(data, remaining);
7019 
7020  if(m_waitforbyteswritten_msecs > 0)
7021  m_bluetoothSocket->waitForBytesWritten
7022  (m_waitforbyteswritten_msecs);
7023 #endif
7024  }
7025  else if(m_sctpSocket)
7026  sent = m_sctpSocket->write(data, remaining);
7027  else if(m_tcpSocket)
7028  {
7029  sent = m_tcpSocket->write(data, remaining);
7030 
7031  if(m_waitforbyteswritten_msecs > 0)
7032  m_tcpSocket->waitForBytesWritten(m_waitforbyteswritten_msecs);
7033  }
7034  else if(m_udpSocket)
7035  {
7036  if(m_isUserDefined)
7037  sent = m_udpSocket->write(data, qMin(minimum, remaining));
7038  else
7039  {
7040  QHostAddress address(m_address);
7041 
7042  address.setScopeId(m_scopeId);
7043  sent = m_udpSocket->writeDatagram
7044  (data, qMin(minimum, remaining), address, m_port);
7045  }
7046 
7047  if(m_waitforbyteswritten_msecs > 0)
7048  m_udpSocket->waitForBytesWritten(m_waitforbyteswritten_msecs);
7049 
7050  if(sent == -1)
7051  {
7052  if(m_udpSocket->error() ==
7053  QAbstractSocket::DatagramTooLargeError)
7054  {
7055  minimum = minimum / 2;
7056 
7057  if(minimum > 0)
7058  continue;
7059  }
7060  else if(m_udpSocket->error() ==
7061  QAbstractSocket::UnknownSocketError)
7062  {
7063  /*
7064  ** If the end-point is absent, QIODevice::write() may
7065  ** return -1.
7066  */
7067 
7068  deleteLater();
7069  break;
7070  }
7071  }
7072  }
7073  else
7074  sent = 0;
7075 
7076  if(sent > 0)
7077  addToBytesWritten(sent);
7078 
7079  if(sent <= 0 || sent > size)
7080  break;
7081 
7082  data += sent;
7083  remaining -= sent;
7084  }
7085 
7086  return size - remaining;
7087 }
